               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">The night is dark; light and spirits will become it</div>
                     <div class="line">well. Heaven prosper our sport! No man means evil</div>
                     <div class="line">but the devil, and we shall know him by his horns.</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's away; follow me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  A street leading to the Park.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and
DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Master doctor, my daughter is in green: when you</div>
                     <div class="line">see your time, take her by the band, away with her</div>
                     <div class="line">to the deanery, and dispatch it quickly. Go before</div>
                     <div class="line">into the Park: we two must go together.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I know vat I have to do. Adieu.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Fare you well, sir.</div>
                     <p>Exit DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                     <div class="line">My husband will not rejoice so much at the abuse of</div>
                     <div class="line">Falstaff as he will chafe at the doctor's marrying</div>
                     <div class="line">my daughter: but 'tis no matter; better a little</div>
                     <div class="line">chiding than a great deal of heart-break.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is Nan now and her troop of fairies, and the</div>
                     <div class="line">Welsh devil Hugh?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">They are all couched in a pit hard by Herne's oak,</div>
                     <div class="line">with obscured lights; which, at the very instant of</div>
                     <div class="line">Falstaff's and our meeting, they will at once</div>
                     <div class="line">display to the night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">That cannot choose but amaze him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">If he be not amazed, he will be mocked; if he be</div>
                     <div class="line">amazed, he will every way be mocked.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll betray him finely.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Against such lewdsters and their lechery</div>
                     <div class="line">Those that betray them do no treachery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">The hour draws on. To the oak, to the oak!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Windsor Park.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised, with others as Fairies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Trib, trib, fairies; come; and remember your parts:</div>
                     <div class="line">be pold, I pray you; follow me into the pit; and</div>
                     <div class="line">when I give the watch-'ords, do as I pid you:</div>
                     <div class="line">come, come; trib, trib.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another part of the Park.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter FALSTAFF disguised as Herne</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">The Windsor bell hath struck twelve; the minute</div>
                     <div class="line">draws on. Now, the hot-blooded gods assist me!</div>
                     <div class="line">Remember, Jove, thou wast a bull for thy Europa; love</div>
                     <div class="line">set on thy horns. O powerful love! that, in some</div>
                     <div class="line">respects, makes a beast a man, in some other, a man</div>
                     <div class="line">a beast. You were also, Jupiter, a swan for the love</div>
                     <div class="line">of Leda. O omnipotent Love! how near the god drew</div>
                     <div class="line">to the complexion of a goose! A fault done first in</div>
                     <div class="line">the form of a beast. O Jove, a beastly fault! And</div>
                     <div class="line">then another fault in the semblance of a fowl; think</div>
                     <div class="line">on 't, Jove; a foul fault! When gods have hot</div>
                     <div class="line">backs, what shall poor men do? For me, I am here a</div>
                     <div class="line">Windsor stag; and the fattest, I think, i' the</div>
                     <div class="line">forest. Send me a cool rut-time, Jove, or who can</div>
                     <div class="line">blame me to piss my tallow? Who comes here? my</div>
                     <div class="line">doe?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John! art thou there, my deer? my male deer?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">My doe with the black scut! Let the sky rain</div>
                     <div class="line">potatoes; let it thunder to the tune of Green</div>
                     <div class="line">Sleeves, hail kissing-comfits and snow eringoes; let</div>
                     <div class="line">there come a tempest of provocation, I will shelter me here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress Page is come with me, sweetheart.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Divide me like a bribe buck, each a haunch: I will</div>
                     <div class="line">keep my sides to myself, my shoulders for the fellow</div>
                     <div class="line">of this walk, and my horns I bequeath your husbands.</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I a woodman, ha? Speak I like Herne the hunter?</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, now is Cupid a child of conscience; he makes</div>
                     <div class="line">restitution. As I am a true spirit, welcome!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Noise within</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, what noise?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven forgive our sins</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">What should this be?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They run off</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I think the devil will not have me damned, lest the</div>
                     <div class="line">oil that's in me should set hell on fire; he would</div>
                     <div class="line">never else cross me thus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised as before; PISTOL,
as Hobgoblin; MISTRESS QUICKLY, ANNE PAGE, and
others, as Fairies, with tapers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Fairies, black, grey, green, and white,</div>
                     <div class="line">You moonshine revellers and shades of night,</div>
                     <div class="line">You orphan heirs of fixed destiny,</div>
                     <div class="line">Attend your office and your quality.</div>
                     <div class="line">Crier Hobgoblin, make the fairy oyes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                     <div class="line">Elves, list your names; silence, you airy toys.</div>
                     <div class="line">Cricket, to Windsor chimneys shalt thou leap:</div>
                     <div class="line">Where fires thou find'st unraked and hearths unswept,</div>
                     <div class="line">There pinch the maids as blue as bilberry:</div>
                     <div class="line">Our radiant queen hates sluts and sluttery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">They are fairies; he that speaks to them shall die:</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll wink and couch: no man their works must eye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Lies down upon his face</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Where's Bede? Go you, and where you find a maid</div>
                     <div class="line">That, ere she sleep, has thrice her prayers said,</div>
                     <div class="line">Raise up the organs of her fantasy;</div>
                     <div class="line">Sleep she as sound as careless infancy:</div>
                     <div class="line">But those as sleep and think not on their sins,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pinch them, arms, legs, backs, shoulders, sides and shins.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">About, about;</div>
                     <div class="line">Search Windsor Castle, elves, within and out:</div>
                     <div class="line">Strew good luck, ouphes, on every sacred room:</div>
                     <div class="line">That it may stand till the perpetual doom,</div>
                     <div class="line">In state as wholesome as in state 'tis fit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Worthy the owner, and the owner it.</div>
                     <div class="line">The several chairs of order look you scour</div>
                     <div class="line">With juice of balm and every precious flower:</div>
                     <div class="line">Each fair instalment, coat, and several crest,</div>
                     <div class="line">With loyal blazon, evermore be blest!</div>
                     <div class="line">And nightly, meadow-fairies, look you sing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like to the Garter's compass, in a ring:</div>
                     <div class="line">The expressure that it bears, green let it be,</div>
                     <div class="line">More fertile-fresh than all the field to see;</div>
                     <div class="line">And 'Honi soit qui mal y pense' write</div>
                     <div class="line">In emerald tufts, flowers purple, blue and white;</div>
                     <div class="line">Let sapphire, pearl and rich embroidery,</div>
                     <div class="line">Buckled below fair knighthood's bending knee:</div>
                     <div class="line">Fairies use flowers for their charactery.</div>
                     <div class="line">Away; disperse: but till 'tis one o'clock,</div>
                     <div class="line">Our dance of custom round about the oak</div>
                     <div class="line">Of Herne the hunter, let us not forget.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you, lock hand in hand; yourselves in order set</div>
                     <div class="line">And twenty glow-worms shall our lanterns be,</div>
                     <div class="line">To guide our measure round about the tree.</div>
                     <div class="line">But, stay; I smell a man of middle-earth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Heavens defend me from that Welsh fairy, lest he</div>
                     <div class="line">transform me to a piece of cheese!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                     <div class="line">Vile worm, thou wast o'erlook'd even in thy birth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">With trial-fire touch me his finger-end:</div>
                     <div class="line">If he be chaste, the flame will back descend</div>
                     <div class="line">And turn him to no pain; but if he start,</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the flesh of a corrupted heart.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                     <div class="line">A trial, come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, will this wood take fire?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They burn him with their tapers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Oh, Oh, Oh!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                     <div class="line">Corrupt, corrupt, and tainted in desire!</div>
                     <div class="line">About him, fairies; sing a scornful rhyme;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, as you trip, still pinch him to your time.</div>
                     <h3 class="bridgehead">SONG.</h3>
                     <div class="line">Fie on sinful fantasy!</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie on lust and luxury!</div>
                     <div class="line">Lust is but a bloody fire,</div>
                     <div class="line">Kindled with unchaste desire,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fed in heart, whose flames aspire</div>
                     <div class="line">As thoughts do blow them, higher and higher.</div>
                     <div class="line">Pinch him, fairies, mutually;</div>
                     <div class="line">Pinch him for his villany;</div>
                     <div class="line">Pinch him, and burn him, and turn him about,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till candles and starlight and moonshine be out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>During this song they pinch FALSTAFF. DOCTOR CAIUS
comes one way, and steals away a boy in green;
SLENDER another way, and takes off a boy in white;
and FENTON comes and steals away ANN PAGE.
A noise of hunting is heard within. All the
Fairies run away. FALSTAFF pulls off his buck's
head, and rises</p>
               <p>Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, and MISTRESS FORD</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, do not fly; I think we have watch'd you now</div>
                     <div class="line">Will none but Herne the hunter serve your turn?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, come, hold up the jest no higher</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, good Sir John, how like you Windsor wives?</div>
                     <div class="line">See you these, husband? do not these fair yokes</div>
                     <div class="line">Become the forest better than the town?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, sir, who's a cuckold now? Master Brook,</div>
                     <div class="line">Falstaff's a knave, a cuckoldly knave; here are his</div>
                     <div class="line">horns, Master Brook: and, Master Brook, he hath</div>
                     <div class="line">enjoyed nothing of Ford's but his buck-basket, his</div>
                     <div class="line">cudgel, and twenty pounds of money, which must be</div>
                     <div class="line">paid to Master Brook; his horses are arrested for</div>
                     <div class="line">it, Master Brook.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John, we have had ill luck; we could never meet.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will never take you for my love again; but I will</div>
                     <div class="line">always count you my deer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I do begin to perceive that I am made an ass.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and an ox too: both the proofs are extant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">And these are not fairies? I was three or four</div>
                     <div class="line">times in the thought they were not fairies: and yet</div>
                     <div class="line">the guiltiness of my mind, the sudden surprise of my</div>
                     <div class="line">powers, drove the grossness of the foppery into a</div>
                     <div class="line">received belief, in despite of the teeth of all</div>
                     <div class="line">rhyme and reason, that they were fairies. See now</div>
                     <div class="line">how wit may be made a Jack-a-Lent, when 'tis upon</div>
                     <div class="line">ill employment!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John Falstaff, serve Got, and leave your</div>
                     <div class="line">desires, and fairies will not pinse you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Well said, fairy Hugh.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">And leave your jealousies too, I pray you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">I will never mistrust my wife again till thou art</div>
                     <div class="line">able to woo her in good English.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I laid my brain in the sun and dried it, that</div>
                     <div class="line">it wants matter to prevent so gross o'erreaching as</div>
                     <div class="line">this? Am I ridden with a Welsh goat too? shall I</div>
                     <div class="line">have a coxcomb of frize? 'Tis time I were choked</div>
                     <div class="line">with a piece of toasted cheese.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">Seese is not good to give putter; your belly is all putter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">'Seese' and 'putter'! have I lived to stand at the</div>
                     <div class="line">taunt of one that makes fritters of English? This</div>
                     <div class="line">is enough to be the decay of lust and late-walking</div>
                     <div class="line">through the realm.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why Sir John, do you think, though we would have the</div>
                     <div class="line">virtue out of our hearts by the head and shoulders</div>
                     <div class="line">and have given ourselves without scruple to hell,</div>
                     <div class="line">that ever the devil could have made you our delight?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">What, a hodge-pudding? a bag of flax?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">A puffed man?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Old, cold, withered and of intolerable entrails?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">And one that is as slanderous as Satan?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">And as poor as Job?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">And as wicked as his wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                     <div class="line">And given to fornications, and to taverns and sack</div>
                     <div class="line">and wine and metheglins, and to drinkings and</div>
                     <div class="line">swearings and starings, pribbles and prabbles?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I am your theme: you have the start of me; I</div>
                     <div class="line">am dejected; I am not able to answer the Welsh</div>
                     <div class="line">flannel; ignorance itself is a plummet o'er me: use</div>
                     <div class="line">me as you will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, we'll bring you to Windsor, to one</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Brook, that you have cozened of money, to</div>
                     <div class="line">whom you should have been a pander: over and above</div>
                     <div class="line">that you have suffered, I think to repay that money</div>
                     <div class="line">will be a biting affliction.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet be cheerful, knight: thou shalt eat a posset</div>
                     <div class="line">to-night at my house; where I will desire thee to</div>
                     <div class="line">laugh at my wife, that now laughs at thee: tell her</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Slender hath married her daughter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  Doctors doubt that: if Anne Page be my</div>
                     <div class="line">daughter, she is, by this, Doctor Caius' wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter SLENDER</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                     <div class="line">Whoa ho! ho, father Page!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Son, how now! how now, son! have you dispatched?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispatched! I'll make the best in Gloucestershire</div>
                     <div class="line">know on't; would I were hanged, la, else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Of what, son?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                     <div class="line">I came yonder at Eton to marry Mistress Anne Page,</div>
                     <div class="line">and she's a great lubberly boy. If it had not been</div>
                     <div class="line">i' the church, I would have swinged him, or he</div>
                     <div class="line">should have swinged me. If I did not think it had</div>
                     <div class="line">been Anne Page, would I might never stir!--and 'tis</div>
                     <div class="line">a postmaster's boy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon my life, then, you took the wrong.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                     <div class="line">What need you tell me that? I think so, when I took</div>
                     <div class="line">a boy for a girl. If I had been married to him, for</div>
                     <div class="line">all he was in woman's apparel, I would not have had</div>
                     <div class="line">him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this is your own folly. Did not I tell you how</div>
                     <div class="line">you should know my daughter by her garments?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                     <div class="line">I went to her in white, and cried 'mum,' and she</div>
                     <div class="line">cried 'budget,' as Anne and I had appointed; and yet</div>
                     <div class="line">it was not Anne, but a postmaster's boy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Good George, be not angry: I knew of your purpose;</div>
                     <div class="line">turned my daughter into green; and, indeed, she is</div>
                     <div class="line">now with the doctor at the deanery, and there married.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Vere is Mistress Page? By gar, I am cozened: I ha'</div>
                     <div class="line">married un garcon, a boy; un paysan, by gar, a boy;</div>
                     <div class="line">it is not Anne Page: by gar, I am cozened.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, did you take her in green?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, by gar, and 'tis a boy: by gar, I'll raise all Windsor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">This is strange. Who hath got the right Anne?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">My heart misgives me: here comes Master Fenton.</div>
                     <p>Enter FENTON and ANNE PAGE</p>
                     <div class="line">How now, Master Fenton!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon, good father! good my mother, pardon!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, mistress, how chance you went not with Master Slender?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why went you not with master doctor, maid?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                     <div class="line">You do amaze her: hear the truth of it.</div>
                     <div class="line">You would have married her most shamefully,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where there was no proportion held in love.</div>
                     <div class="line">The truth is, she and I, long since contracted,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are now so sure that nothing can dissolve us.</div>
                     <div class="line">The offence is holy that she hath committed;</div>
                     <div class="line">And this deceit loses the name of craft,</div>
                     <div class="line">Of disobedience, or unduteous title,</div>
                     <div class="line">Since therein she doth evitate and shun</div>
                     <div class="line">A thousand irreligious cursed hours,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which forced marriage would have brought upon her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand not amazed; here is no remedy:</div>
                     <div class="line">In love the heavens themselves do guide the state;</div>
                     <div class="line">Money buys lands, and wives are sold by fate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">I am glad, though you have ta'en a special stand to</div>
                     <div class="line">strike at me, that your arrow hath glanced.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, what remedy? Fenton, heaven give thee joy!</div>
                     <div class="line">What cannot be eschew'd must be embraced.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                     <div class="line">When night-dogs run, all sorts of deer are chased.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I will muse no further. Master Fenton,</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven give you many, many merry days!</div>
                     <div class="line">Good husband, let us every one go home,</div>
                     <div class="line">And laugh this sport o'er by a country fire;</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir John and all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it be so. Sir John,</div>
                     <div class="line">To Master Brook you yet shall hold your word</div>
                     <div class="line">For he tonight shall lie with Mistress Ford.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>

      <link href="../../resources/css/prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/publishers.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <meta charset="utf-8"/>
      <meta content="DocBook XSL 2.0 Stylesheets Vxxx" name="generator"/>
      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>The Merry Wives of Windsor</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>The Merry Wives of Windsor</h1>
         </header>
         <div class="lists-of-titles">
            <div class="toc">
               <p>
                  <b>Table of Contents</b>
               </p>
               <ul class="toc">
                  <li>

                  <li>
                     <span>

                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Windsor. Before PAGE's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in DOCTOR CAIUS' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.4">2. ACT II</a>
                     </span>

                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PAGE'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  A field near Windsor.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.5">3. ACT III</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A field near Frogmore.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in PAGE'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.6">4. ACT IV</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.6">5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.7">6. SCENE VI.  Another room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.7">5. ACT V</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  Windsor Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  A street leading to the Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  Windsor Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.6">5. SCENE V.  Another part of the Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
               </ul>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR JOHN FALSTAFF</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">FENTON, a gentleman.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SHALLOW, a country justice.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SLENDER, cousin to Shallow.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">FORD</span>
                              <span class="personname">PAGE</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">two gentlemen dwelling at Windsor.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">WILLIAM PAGE, a boy, son to Page.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIR HUGH EVANS, a Welsh parson.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DOCTOR CAIUS, a French physician.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Host of the Garter Inn. </span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">BARDOLPH</span>
                              <span class="personname">PISTOL</span>
                              <span class="personname">NYM</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">sharpers attending on Falstaff.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ROBIN, page to Falstaff.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SIMPLE, servant to Slender.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">RUGBY, servant to Doctor Caius.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MISTRESS FORD</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MISTRESS PAGE</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ANNE PAGE, her daughter.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MISTRESS QUICKLY, servant to Doctor Caius.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Servants to Page, Ford, &c.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  Windsor, and the neighbourhood.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Windsor. Before PAGE's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in DOCTOR CAIUS' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Windsor. Before PAGE's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Hugh, persuade me not; I will make a Star-</div>
                              <div class="line">chamber matter of it: if he were twenty Sir John</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaffs, he shall not abuse Robert Shallow, esquire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">In the county of Gloucester, justice of peace and</div>
                              <div class="line">'Coram.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, cousin Slender, and 'Custalourum.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and 'Rato-lorum' too; and a gentleman born,</div>
                              <div class="line">master parson; who writes himself 'Armigero,' in any</div>
                              <div class="line">bill, warrant, quittance, or obligation, 'Armigero.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that I do; and have done any time these three</div>
                              <div class="line">hundred years.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">All his successors gone before him hath done't; and</div>
                              <div class="line">all his ancestors that come after him may: they may</div>
                              <div class="line">give the dozen white luces in their coat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">It is an old coat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">The dozen white louses do become an old coat well;</div>
                              <div class="line">it agrees well, passant; it is a familiar beast to</div>
                              <div class="line">man, and signifies love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">The luce is the fresh fish; the salt fish is an old coat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I may quarter, coz.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">You may, by marrying.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is marring indeed, if he quarter it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a whit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, py'r lady; if he has a quarter of your coat,</div>
                              <div class="line">there is but three skirts for yourself, in my</div>
                              <div class="line">simple conjectures: but that is all one. If Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">John Falstaff have committed disparagements unto</div>
                              <div class="line">you, I am of the church, and will be glad to do my</div>
                              <div class="line">benevolence to make atonements and compremises</div>
                              <div class="line">between you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">The council shall bear it; it is a riot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not meet the council hear a riot; there is no</div>
                              <div class="line">fear of Got in a riot: the council, look you, shall</div>
                              <div class="line">desire to hear the fear of Got, and not to hear a</div>
                              <div class="line">riot; take your vizaments in that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! o' my life, if I were young again, the sword</div>
                              <div class="line">should end it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is petter that friends is the sword, and end it:</div>
                              <div class="line">and there is also another device in my prain, which</div>
                              <div class="line">peradventure prings goot discretions with it: there</div>
                              <div class="line">is Anne Page, which is daughter to Master Thomas</div>
                              <div class="line">Page, which is pretty virginity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne Page? She has brown hair, and speaks</div>
                              <div class="line">small like a woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is that fery person for all the orld, as just as</div>
                              <div class="line">you will desire; and seven hundred pounds of moneys,</div>
                              <div class="line">and gold and silver, is her grandsire upon his</div>
                              <div class="line">death's-bed--Got deliver to a joyful resurrections!</div>
                              <div class="line">--give, when she is able to overtake seventeen years</div>
                              <div class="line">old: it were a goot motion if we leave our pribbles</div>
                              <div class="line">and prabbles, and desire a marriage between Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Abraham and Mistress Anne Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Did her grandsire leave her seven hundred pound?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and her father is make her a petter penny.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I know the young gentlewoman; she has good gifts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Seven hundred pounds and possibilities is goot gifts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, let us see honest Master Page. Is Falstaff there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I tell you a lie? I do despise a liar as I do</div>
                              <div class="line">despise one that is false, or as I despise one that</div>
                              <div class="line">is not true. The knight, Sir John, is there; and, I</div>
                              <div class="line">beseech you, be ruled by your well-willers. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">peat the door for Master Page.</div>
                              <p>Knocks</p>
                              <div class="line">What, hoa! Got pless your house here!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who's there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is Got's plessing, and your friend, and Justice</div>
                              <div class="line">Shallow; and here young Master Slender, that</div>
                              <div class="line">peradventures shall tell you another tale, if</div>
                              <div class="line">matters grow to your likings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see your worships well.</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you for my venison, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Page, I am glad to see you: much good do it</div>
                              <div class="line">your good heart! I wished your venison better; it</div>
                              <div class="line">was ill killed. How doth good Mistress Page?--and I</div>
                              <div class="line">thank you always with my heart, la! with my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I thank you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I thank you; by yea and no, I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you, good Master Slender.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">How does your fallow greyhound, sir? I heard say he</div>
                              <div class="line">was outrun on Cotsall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">It could not be judged, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll not confess, you'll not confess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">That he will not. 'Tis your fault, 'tis your fault;</div>
                              <div class="line">'tis a good dog.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">A cur, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, he's a good dog, and a fair dog: can there be</div>
                              <div class="line">more said? he is good and fair. Is Sir John</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, he is within; and I would I could do a good</div>
                              <div class="line">office between you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is spoke as a Christians ought to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath wronged me, Master Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, he doth in some sort confess it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be confessed, it is not redress'd: is not that</div>
                              <div class="line">so, Master Page? He hath wronged me; indeed he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath, at a word, he hath, believe me: Robert</div>
                              <div class="line">Shallow, esquire, saith, he is wronged.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF, BARDOLPH, NYM, and PISTOL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Master Shallow, you'll complain of me to the king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Knight, you have beaten my men, killed my deer, and</div>
                              <div class="line">broke open my lodge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">But not kissed your keeper's daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Tut, a pin! this shall be answered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I will answer it straight; I have done all this.</div>
                              <div class="line">That is now answered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">The council shall know this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere better for you if it were known in counsel:</div>
                              <div class="line">you'll be laughed at.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pauca verba, Sir John; goot worts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good worts! good cabbage. Slender, I broke your</div>
                              <div class="line">head: what matter have you against me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I have matter in my head against you;</div>
                              <div class="line">and against your cony-catching rascals, Bardolph,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nym, and Pistol.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">You Banbury cheese!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, it is no matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, Mephostophilus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, it is no matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">Slice, I say! pauca, pauca: slice! that's my humour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's Simple, my man? Can you tell, cousin?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, I pray you. Now let us understand. There is</div>
                              <div class="line">three umpires in this matter, as I understand; that</div>
                              <div class="line">is, Master Page, fidelicet Master Page; and there is</div>
                              <div class="line">myself, fidelicet myself; and the three party is,</div>
                              <div class="line">lastly and finally, mine host of the Garter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
