                              <div class="line">We three, to hear it and end it between them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fery goot: I will make a prief of it in my note-</div>
                              <div class="line">book; and we will afterwards ork upon the cause with</div>
                              <div class="line">as great discreetly as we can.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Pistol!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">He hears with ears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">The tevil and his tam! what phrase is this, 'He</div>
                              <div class="line">hears with ear'? why, it is affectations.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Pistol, did you pick Master Slender's purse?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, by these gloves, did he, or I would I might</div>
                              <div class="line">never come in mine own great chamber again else, of</div>
                              <div class="line">seven groats in mill-sixpences, and two Edward</div>
                              <div class="line">shovel-boards, that cost me two shilling and two</div>
                              <div class="line">pence apiece of Yead Miller, by these gloves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this true, Pistol?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">No; it is false, if it is a pick-purse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, thou mountain-foreigner! Sir John and Master mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">I combat challenge of this latten bilbo.</div>
                              <div class="line">Word of denial in thy labras here!</div>
                              <div class="line">Word of denial: froth and scum, thou liest!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">By these gloves, then, 'twas he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">Be avised, sir, and pass good humours: I will say</div>
                              <div class="line">'marry trap' with you, if you run the nuthook's</div>
                              <div class="line">humour on me; that is the very note of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">By this hat, then, he in the red face had it; for</div>
                              <div class="line">though I cannot remember what I did when you made me</div>
                              <div class="line">drunk, yet I am not altogether an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you, Scarlet and John?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, for my part I say the gentleman had drunk</div>
                              <div class="line">himself out of his five sentences.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is his five senses: fie, what the ignorance is!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">And being fap, sir, was, as they say, cashiered; and</div>
                              <div class="line">so conclusions passed the careires.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, you spake in Latin then too; but 'tis no</div>
                              <div class="line">matter: I'll ne'er be drunk whilst I live again,</div>
                              <div class="line">but in honest, civil, godly company, for this trick:</div>
                              <div class="line">if I be drunk, I'll be drunk with those that have</div>
                              <div class="line">the fear of God, and not with drunken knaves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">So Got udge me, that is a virtuous mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You hear all these matters denied, gentlemen; you hear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANNE PAGE, with wine; MISTRESS FORD
and MISTRESS PAGE, following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, daughter, carry the wine in; we'll drink within.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit ANNE PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">O heaven! this is Mistress Anne Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, Mistress Ford!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford, by my troth, you are very well met:</div>
                              <div class="line">by your leave, good mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Kisses her</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Wife, bid these gentlemen welcome. Come, we have a</div>
                              <div class="line">hot venison pasty to dinner: come, gentlemen, I hope</div>
                              <div class="line">we shall drink down all unkindness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all except SHALLOW, SLENDER, and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather than forty shillings I had my Book of</div>
                              <div class="line">Songs and Sonnets here.</div>
                              <p>Enter SIMPLE</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Simple! where have you been? I must wait</div>
                              <div class="line">on myself, must I? You have not the Book of Riddles</div>
                              <div class="line">about you, have you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Book of Riddles! why, did you not lend it to Alice</div>
                              <div class="line">Shortcake upon All-hallowmas last, a fortnight</div>
                              <div class="line">afore Michaelmas?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, coz; come, coz; we stay for you. A word with</div>
                              <div class="line">you, coz; marry, this, coz: there is, as 'twere, a</div>
                              <div class="line">tender, a kind of tender, made afar off by Sir Hugh</div>
                              <div class="line">here. Do you understand me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, you shall find me reasonable; if it be so,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall do that that is reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but understand me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">So I do, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Give ear to his motions, Master Slender: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">description the matter to you, if you be capacity of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I will do as my cousin Shallow says: I pray</div>
                              <div class="line">you, pardon me; he's a justice of peace in his</div>
                              <div class="line">country, simple though I stand here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">But that is not the question: the question is</div>
                              <div class="line">concerning your marriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, there's the point, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, is it; the very point of it; to Mistress Anne Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, if it be so, I will marry her upon any</div>
                              <div class="line">reasonable demands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">But can you affection the 'oman? Let us command to</div>
                              <div class="line">know that of your mouth or of your lips; for divers</div>
                              <div class="line">philosophers hold that the lips is parcel of the</div>
                              <div class="line">mouth. Therefore, precisely, can you carry your</div>
                              <div class="line">good will to the maid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin Abraham Slender, can you love her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, sir, I will do as it shall become one that</div>
                              <div class="line">would do reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, Got's lords and his ladies! you must speak</div>
                              <div class="line">possitable, if you can carry her your desires</div>
                              <div class="line">towards her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">That you must. Will you, upon good dowry, marry her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I will do a greater thing than that, upon your</div>
                              <div class="line">request, cousin, in any reason.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, conceive me, conceive me, sweet coz: what I do</div>
                              <div class="line">is to pleasure you, coz. Can you love the maid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I will marry her, sir, at your request: but if there</div>
                              <div class="line">be no great love in the beginning, yet heaven may</div>
                              <div class="line">decrease it upon better acquaintance, when we are</div>
                              <div class="line">married and have more occasion to know one another;</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, upon familiarity will grow more contempt:</div>
                              <div class="line">but if you say, 'Marry her,' I will marry her; that</div>
                              <div class="line">I am freely dissolved, and dissolutely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a fery discretion answer; save the fall is in</div>
                              <div class="line">the ort 'dissolutely:' the ort is, according to our</div>
                              <div class="line">meaning, 'resolutely:' his meaning is good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, I think my cousin meant well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, or else I would I might be hanged, la!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes fair Mistress Anne.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter ANNE PAGE</p>
                              <div class="line">Would I were young for your sake, Mistress Anne!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">The dinner is on the table; my father desires your</div>
                              <div class="line">worships' company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I will wait on him, fair Mistress Anne.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Od's plessed will! I will not be absence at the grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt SHALLOW and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Will't please your worship to come in, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I thank you, forsooth, heartily; I am very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">The dinner attends you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not a-hungry, I thank you, forsooth. Go,</div>
                              <div class="line">sirrah, for all you are my man, go wait upon my</div>
                              <div class="line">cousin Shallow.</div>
                              <p>Exit SIMPLE</p>
                              <div class="line">A justice of peace sometimes may be beholding to his</div>
                              <div class="line">friend for a man. I keep but three men and a boy</div>
                              <div class="line">yet, till my mother be dead: but what though? Yet I</div>
                              <div class="line">live like a poor gentleman born.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I may not go in without your worship: they will not</div>
                              <div class="line">sit till you come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I' faith, I'll eat nothing; I thank you as much as</div>
                              <div class="line">though I did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, sir, walk in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather walk here, I thank you. I bruised</div>
                              <div class="line">my shin th' other day with playing at sword and</div>
                              <div class="line">dagger with a master of fence; three veneys for a</div>
                              <div class="line">dish of stewed prunes; and, by my troth, I cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">abide the smell of hot meat since. Why do your</div>
                              <div class="line">dogs bark so? be there bears i' the town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I think there are, sir; I heard them talked of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I love the sport well but I shall as soon quarrel at</div>
                              <div class="line">it as any man in England. You are afraid, if you see</div>
                              <div class="line">the bear loose, are you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, indeed, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">That's meat and drink to me, now. I have seen</div>
                              <div class="line">Sackerson loose twenty times, and have taken him by</div>
                              <div class="line">the chain; but, I warrant you, the women have so</div>
                              <div class="line">cried and shrieked at it, that it passed: but women,</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed, cannot abide 'em; they are very ill-favored</div>
                              <div class="line">rough things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, gentle Master Slender, come; we stay for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll eat nothing, I thank you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">By cock and pie, you shall not choose, sir! come, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, pray you, lead the way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne, yourself shall go first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I, sir; pray you, keep on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll rather be unmannerly than troublesome.</div>
                              <div class="line">You do yourself wrong, indeed, la!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go your ways, and ask of Doctor Caius' house which</div>
                              <div class="line">is the way: and there dwells one Mistress Quickly,</div>
                              <div class="line">which is in the manner of his nurse, or his dry</div>
                              <div class="line">nurse, or his cook, or his laundry, his washer, and</div>
                              <div class="line">his wringer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is petter yet. Give her this letter; for it</div>
                              <div class="line">is a 'oman that altogether's acquaintance with</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne Page: and the letter is, to desire</div>
                              <div class="line">and require her to solicit your master's desires to</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne Page. I pray you, be gone: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">make an end of my dinner; there's pippins and cheese to come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF, Host, BARDOLPH, NYM, PISTOL,
and ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine host of the Garter!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What says my bully-rook? speak scholarly and wisely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, mine host, I must turn away some of my</div>
                              <div class="line">followers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Discard, bully Hercules; cashier: let them wag; trot, trot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I sit at ten pounds a week.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt an emperor, Caesar, Keisar, and Pheezar. I</div>
                              <div class="line">will entertain Bardolph; he shall draw, he shall</div>
                              <div class="line">tap: said I well, bully Hector?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so, good mine host.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">I have spoke; let him follow.</div>
                              <p>To BARDOLPH</p>
                              <div class="line">Let me see thee froth and lime: I am at a word; follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Bardolph, follow him. A tapster is a good trade:</div>
                              <div class="line">an old cloak makes a new jerkin; a withered</div>
                              <div class="line">serving-man a fresh tapster. Go; adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a life that I have desired: I will thrive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">O base Hungarian wight! wilt thou the spigot wield?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">He was gotten in drink: is not the humour conceited?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad I am so acquit of this tinderbox: his</div>
                              <div class="line">thefts were too open; his filching was like an</div>
                              <div class="line">unskilful singer; he kept not time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">The good humour is to steal at a minute's rest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">'Convey,' the wise it call. 'Steal!' foh! a fico</div>
                              <div class="line">for the phrase!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sirs, I am almost out at heels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, let kibes ensue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no remedy; I must cony-catch; I must shift.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Young ravens must have food.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Which of you know Ford of this town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">I ken the wight: he is of substance good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">My honest lads, I will tell you what I am about.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Two yards, and more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No quips now, Pistol! Indeed, I am in the waist two</div>
                              <div class="line">yards about; but I am now about no waste; I am about</div>
                              <div class="line">thrift. Briefly, I do mean to make love to Ford's</div>
                              <div class="line">wife: I spy entertainment in her; she discourses,</div>
                              <div class="line">she carves, she gives the leer of invitation: I</div>
                              <div class="line">can construe the action of her familiar style; and</div>
                              <div class="line">the hardest voice of her behavior, to be Englished</div>
                              <div class="line">rightly, is, 'I am Sir John Falstaff's.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath studied her will, and translated her will,</div>
                              <div class="line">out of honesty into English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">The anchor is deep: will that humour pass?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, the report goes she has all the rule of her</div>
                              <div class="line">husband's purse: he hath a legion of angels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">As many devils entertain; and 'To her, boy,' say I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">The humour rises; it is good: humour me the angels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I have writ me here a letter to her: and here</div>
                              <div class="line">another to Page's wife, who even now gave me good</div>
                              <div class="line">eyes too, examined my parts with most judicious</div>
                              <div class="line">oeillades; sometimes the beam of her view gilded my</div>
                              <div class="line">foot, sometimes my portly belly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Then did the sun on dunghill shine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee for that humour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">O, she did so course o'er my exteriors with such a</div>
                              <div class="line">greedy intention, that the appetite of her eye did</div>
                              <div class="line">seem to scorch me up like a burning-glass! Here's</div>
                              <div class="line">another letter to her: she bears the purse too; she</div>
                              <div class="line">is a region in Guiana, all gold and bounty. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">be cheater to them both, and they shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">exchequers to me; they shall be my East and West</div>
                              <div class="line">Indies, and I will trade to them both. Go bear thou</div>
                              <div class="line">this letter to Mistress Page; and thou this to</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford: we will thrive, lads, we will thrive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I Sir Pandarus of Troy become,</div>
                              <div class="line">And by my side wear steel? then, Lucifer take all!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">I will run no base humour: here, take the</div>
                              <div class="line">humour-letter: I will keep the havior of reputation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To ROBIN</span>  Hold, sirrah, bear you these letters tightly;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sail like my pinnace to these golden shores.</div>
                              <div class="line">Rogues, hence, avaunt! vanish like hailstones, go;</div>
                              <div class="line">Trudge, plod away o' the hoof; seek shelter, pack!</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff will learn the humour of the age,</div>
                              <div class="line">French thrift, you rogues; myself and skirted page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FALSTAFF and ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Let vultures gripe thy guts! for gourd and fullam holds,</div>
                              <div class="line">And high and low beguiles the rich and poor:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tester I'll have in pouch when thou shalt lack,</div>
                              <div class="line">Base Phrygian Turk!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">I have operations which be humours of revenge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou revenge?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">By welkin and her star!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">With wit or steel?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">With both the humours, I:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will discuss the humour of this love to Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">And I to Ford shall eke unfold</div>
                              <div class="line">How Falstaff, varlet vile,</div>
                              <div class="line">His dove will prove, his gold will hold,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his soft couch defile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">My humour shall not cool: I will incense Page to</div>
                              <div class="line">deal with poison; I will possess him with</div>
                              <div class="line">yellowness, for the revolt of mine is dangerous:</div>
                              <div class="line">that is my true humour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art the Mars of malecontents: I second thee; troop on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in DOCTOR CAIUS' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY, SIMPLE, and RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, John Rugby! I pray thee, go to the casement,</div>
                              <div class="line">and see if you can see my master, Master Doctor</div>
                              <div class="line">Caius, coming. If he do, i' faith, and find any</div>
                              <div class="line">body in the house, here will be an old abusing of</div>
                              <div class="line">God's patience and the king's English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll go watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Go; and we'll have a posset for't soon at night, in</div>
                              <div class="line">faith, at the latter end of a sea-coal fire.</div>
                              <p>Exit RUGBY</p>
                              <div class="line">An honest, willing, kind fellow, as ever servant</div>
                              <div class="line">shall come in house withal, and, I warrant you, no</div>
                              <div class="line">tell-tale nor no breed-bate: his worst fault is,</div>
                              <div class="line">that he is given to prayer; he is something peevish</div>
                              <div class="line">that way: but nobody but has his fault; but let</div>
                              <div class="line">that pass. Peter Simple, you say your name is?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, for fault of a better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">And Master Slender's your master?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Does he not wear a great round beard, like a</div>
                              <div class="line">glover's paring-knife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, forsooth: he hath but a little wee face, with a</div>
                              <div class="line">little yellow beard, a Cain-coloured beard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">A softly-sprighted man, is he not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth: but he is as tall a man of his hands</div>
                              <div class="line">as any is between this and his head; he hath fought</div>
                              <div class="line">with a warrener.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">How say you? O, I should remember him: does he not</div>
                              <div class="line">hold up his head, as it were, and strut in his gait?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, indeed, does he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, heaven send Anne Page no worse fortune! Tell</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Parson Evans I will do what I can for your</div>
                              <div class="line">master: Anne is a good girl, and I wish--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, alas! here comes my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall all be shent. Run in here, good young man;</div>
                              <div class="line">go into this closet: he will not stay long.</div>
                              <p>Shuts SIMPLE in the closet</p>
                              <div class="line">What, John Rugby! John! what, John, I say!</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, John, go inquire for my master; I doubt</div>
                              <div class="line">he be not well, that he comes not home.</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">And down, down, adown-a, &c.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vat is you sing? I do not like des toys. Pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">go and vetch me in my closet un boitier vert, a box,</div>
                              <div class="line">a green-a box: do intend vat I speak? a green-a box.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth; I'll fetch it you.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">I am glad he went not in himself: if he had found</div>
                              <div class="line">the young man, he would have been horn-mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fe, fe, fe, fe! ma foi, il fait fort chaud. Je</div>
                              <div class="line">m'en vais a la cour--la grande affaire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it this, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Oui; mette le au mon pocket: depeche, quickly. Vere</div>
                              <div class="line">is dat knave Rugby?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">What, John Rugby! John!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are John Rugby, and you are Jack Rugby. Come,</div>
                              <div class="line">take-a your rapier, and come after my heel to the court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis ready, sir, here in the porch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By my trot, I tarry too long. Od's me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Qu'ai-j'oublie! dere is some simples in my closet,</div>
                              <div class="line">dat I vill not for the varld I shall leave behind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay me, he'll find the young man here, and be mad!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O diable, diable! vat is in my closet? Villain! larron!</div>
                              <p>Pulling SIMPLE out</p>
                              <div class="line">Rugby, my rapier!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Good master, be content.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore shall I be content-a?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">The young man is an honest man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall de honest man do in my closet? dere is</div>
                              <div class="line">no honest man dat shall come in my closet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you, be not so phlegmatic. Hear the truth</div>
                              <div class="line">of it: he came of an errand to me from Parson Hugh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth; to desire her to--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, I pray you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace-a your tongue. Speak-a your tale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">To desire this honest gentlewoman, your maid, to</div>
                              <div class="line">speak a good word to Mistress Anne Page for my</div>
                              <div class="line">master in the way of marriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">This is all, indeed, la! but I'll ne'er put my</div>
                              <div class="line">finger in the fire, and need not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Hugh send-a you? Rugby, baille me some paper.</div>
                              <div class="line">Tarry you a little-a while.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Writes</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to SIMPLE</span>  I am glad he is so quiet: if he</div>
                              <div class="line">had been thoroughly moved, you should have heard him</div>
                              <div class="line">so loud and so melancholy. But notwithstanding,</div>
                              <div class="line">man, I'll do you your master what good I can: and</div>
                              <div class="line">the very yea and the no is, the French doctor, my</div>
                              <div class="line">master,--I may call him my master, look you, for I</div>
                              <div class="line">keep his house; and I wash, wring, brew, bake,</div>
                              <div class="line">scour, dress meat and drink, make the beds and do</div>
                              <div class="line">all myself,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to MISTRESS QUICKLY</span>  'Tis a great charge to</div>
                              <div class="line">come under one body's hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to SIMPLE</span>  Are you avised o' that? you</div>
                              <div class="line">shall find it a great charge: and to be up early</div>
                              <div class="line">and down late; but notwithstanding,--to tell you in</div>
                              <div class="line">your ear; I would have no words of it,--my master</div>
                              <div class="line">himself is in love with Mistress Anne Page: but</div>
                              <div class="line">notwithstanding that, I know Anne's mind,--that's</div>
                              <div class="line">neither here nor there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You jack'nape, give-a this letter to Sir Hugh; by</div>
                              <div class="line">gar, it is a shallenge: I will cut his troat in dee</div>
                              <div class="line">park; and I will teach a scurvy jack-a-nape priest</div>
                              <div class="line">to meddle or make. You may be gone; it is not good</div>
                              <div class="line">you tarry here. By gar, I will cut all his two</div>
                              <div class="line">stones; by gar, he shall not have a stone to throw</div>
                              <div class="line">at his dog:</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit SIMPLE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, he speaks but for his friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no matter-a ver dat: do not you tell-a me</div>
                              <div class="line">dat I shall have Anne Page for myself? By gar, I</div>
                              <div class="line">vill kill de Jack priest; and I have appointed mine</div>
                              <div class="line">host of de Jarteer to measure our weapon. By gar, I</div>
                              <div class="line">will myself have Anne Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, the maid loves you, and all shall be well. We</div>
                              <div class="line">must give folks leave to prate: what, the good-jer!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Rugby, come to the court with me. By gar, if I have</div>
                              <div class="line">not Anne Page, I shall turn your head out of my</div>
                              <div class="line">door. Follow my heels, Rugby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DOCTOR CAIUS and RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall have An fool's-head of your own. No, I</div>
                              <div class="line">know Anne's mind for that: never a woman in Windsor</div>
                              <div class="line">knows more of Anne's mind than I do; nor can do more</div>
                              <div class="line">than I do with her, I thank heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Who's within there? ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there, I trow! Come near the house, I pray you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FENTON</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, good woman? how dost thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">The better that it pleases your good worship to ask.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">What news? how does pretty Mistress Anne?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">In truth, sir, and she is pretty, and honest, and</div>
                              <div class="line">gentle; and one that is your friend, I can tell you</div>
                              <div class="line">that by the way; I praise heaven for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I do any good, thinkest thou? shall I not lose my suit?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Troth, sir, all is in his hands above: but</div>
