                              <div class="line">notwithstanding, Master Fenton, I'll be sworn on a</div>
                              <div class="line">book, she loves you. Have not your worship a wart</div>
                              <div class="line">above your eye?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, marry, have I; what of that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, thereby hangs a tale: good faith, it is such</div>
                              <div class="line">another Nan; but, I detest, an honest maid as ever</div>
                              <div class="line">broke bread: we had an hour's talk of that wart. I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall never laugh but in that maid's company! But</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed she is given too much to allicholy and</div>
                              <div class="line">musing: but for you--well, go to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I shall see her to-day. Hold, there's money</div>
                              <div class="line">for thee; let me have thy voice in my behalf: if</div>
                              <div class="line">thou seest her before me, commend me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Will I? i'faith, that we will; and I will tell your</div>
                              <div class="line">worship more of the wart the next time we have</div>
                              <div class="line">confidence; and of other wooers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, farewell; I am in great haste now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell to your worship.</div>
                              <p>Exit FENTON</p>
                              <div class="line">Truly, an honest gentleman: but Anne loves him not;</div>
                              <div class="line">for I know Anne's mind as well as another does. Out</div>
                              <div class="line">upon't! what have I forgot?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PAGE'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  A field near Windsor.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PAGE'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE, with a letter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have I scaped love-letters in the holiday-</div>
                              <div class="line">time of my beauty, and am I now a subject for them?</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see.</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">'Ask me no reason why I love you; for though</div>
                              <div class="line">Love use Reason for his physician, he admits him</div>
                              <div class="line">not for his counsellor. You are not young, no more</div>
                              <div class="line">am I; go to then, there's sympathy: you are merry,</div>
                              <div class="line">so am I; ha, ha! then there's more sympathy: you</div>
                              <div class="line">love sack, and so do I; would you desire better</div>
                              <div class="line">sympathy? Let it suffice thee, Mistress Page,--at</div>
                              <div class="line">the least, if the love of soldier can suffice,--</div>
                              <div class="line">that I love thee. I will not say, pity me; 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">not a soldier-like phrase: but I say, love me. By me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thine own true knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">By day or night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or any kind of light,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all his might</div>
                              <div class="line">For thee to fight,    JOHN FALSTAFF'</div>
                              <div class="line">What a Herod of Jewry is this! O wicked</div>
                              <div class="line">world! One that is well-nigh worn to pieces with</div>
                              <div class="line">age to show himself a young gallant! What an</div>
                              <div class="line">unweighed behavior hath this Flemish drunkard</div>
                              <div class="line">picked--with the devil's name!--out of my</div>
                              <div class="line">conversation, that he dares in this manner assay me?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, he hath not been thrice in my company! What</div>
                              <div class="line">should I say to him? I was then frugal of my</div>
                              <div class="line">mirth: Heaven forgive me! Why, I'll exhibit a bill</div>
                              <div class="line">in the parliament for the putting down of men. How</div>
                              <div class="line">shall I be revenged on him? for revenged I will be,</div>
                              <div class="line">as sure as his guts are made of puddings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS FORD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page! trust me, I was going to your house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">And, trust me, I was coming to you. You look very</div>
                              <div class="line">ill.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I'll ne'er believe that; I have to show to the contrary.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, but you do, in my mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I do then; yet I say I could show you to the</div>
                              <div class="line">contrary. O Mistress Page, give me some counsel!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, woman?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">O woman, if it were not for one trifling respect, I</div>
                              <div class="line">could come to such honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang the trifle, woman! take the honour. What is</div>
                              <div class="line">it? dispense with trifles; what is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">If I would but go to hell for an eternal moment or so,</div>
                              <div class="line">I could be knighted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What? thou liest! Sir Alice Ford! These knights</div>
                              <div class="line">will hack; and so thou shouldst not alter the</div>
                              <div class="line">article of thy gentry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">We burn daylight: here, read, read; perceive how I</div>
                              <div class="line">might be knighted. I shall think the worse of fat</div>
                              <div class="line">men, as long as I have an eye to make difference of</div>
                              <div class="line">men's liking: and yet he would not swear; praised</div>
                              <div class="line">women's modesty; and gave such orderly and</div>
                              <div class="line">well-behaved reproof to all uncomeliness, that I</div>
                              <div class="line">would have sworn his disposition would have gone to</div>
                              <div class="line">the truth of his words; but they do no more adhere</div>
                              <div class="line">and keep place together than the Hundredth Psalm to</div>
                              <div class="line">the tune of 'Green Sleeves.' What tempest, I trow,</div>
                              <div class="line">threw this whale, with so many tuns of oil in his</div>
                              <div class="line">belly, ashore at Windsor? How shall I be revenged</div>
                              <div class="line">on him? I think the best way were to entertain him</div>
                              <div class="line">with hope, till the wicked fire of lust have melted</div>
                              <div class="line">him in his own grease. Did you ever hear the like?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Letter for letter, but that the name of Page and</div>
                              <div class="line">Ford differs! To thy great comfort in this mystery</div>
                              <div class="line">of ill opinions, here's the twin-brother of thy</div>
                              <div class="line">letter: but let thine inherit first; for, I</div>
                              <div class="line">protest, mine never shall. I warrant he hath a</div>
                              <div class="line">thousand of these letters, writ with blank space for</div>
                              <div class="line">different names--sure, more,--and these are of the</div>
                              <div class="line">second edition: he will print them, out of doubt;</div>
                              <div class="line">for he cares not what he puts into the press, when</div>
                              <div class="line">he would put us two. I had rather be a giantess,</div>
                              <div class="line">and lie under Mount Pelion. Well, I will find you</div>
                              <div class="line">twenty lascivious turtles ere one chaste man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is the very same; the very hand, the very</div>
                              <div class="line">words. What doth he think of us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I know not: it makes me almost ready to</div>
                              <div class="line">wrangle with mine own honesty. I'll entertain</div>
                              <div class="line">myself like one that I am not acquainted withal;</div>
                              <div class="line">for, sure, unless he know some strain in me, that I</div>
                              <div class="line">know not myself, he would never have boarded me in this fury.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Boarding,' call you it? I'll be sure to keep him</div>
                              <div class="line">above deck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">So will I if he come under my hatches, I'll never</div>
                              <div class="line">to sea again. Let's be revenged on him: let's</div>
                              <div class="line">appoint him a meeting; give him a show of comfort in</div>
                              <div class="line">his suit and lead him on with a fine-baited delay,</div>
                              <div class="line">till he hath pawned his horses to mine host of the Garter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I will consent to act any villany against him,</div>
                              <div class="line">that may not sully the chariness of our honesty. O,</div>
                              <div class="line">that my husband saw this letter! it would give</div>
                              <div class="line">eternal food to his jealousy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, look where he comes; and my good man too: he's</div>
                              <div class="line">as far from jealousy as I am from giving him cause;</div>
                              <div class="line">and that I hope is an unmeasurable distance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">You are the happier woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's consult together against this greasy knight.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They retire</p>
                        <p>Enter FORD with PISTOL, and PAGE with NYM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I hope it be not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Hope is a curtal dog in some affairs:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John affects thy wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, my wife is not young.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">He wooes both high and low, both rich and poor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both young and old, one with another, Ford;</div>
                              <div class="line">He loves the gallimaufry: Ford, perpend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Love my wife!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">With liver burning hot. Prevent, or go thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like Sir Actaeon he, with Ringwood at thy heels:</div>
                              <div class="line">O, odious is the name!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What name, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">The horn, I say. Farewell.</div>
                              <div class="line">Take heed, have open eye, for thieves do foot by night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take heed, ere summer comes or cuckoo-birds do sing.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, Sir Corporal Nym!</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe it, Page; he speaks sense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I will be patient; I will find out this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NYM</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To PAGE</span>  And this is true; I like not the humour</div>
                              <div class="line">of lying. He hath wronged me in some humours: I</div>
                              <div class="line">should have borne the humoured letter to her; but I</div>
                              <div class="line">have a sword and it shall bite upon my necessity.</div>
                              <div class="line">He loves your wife; there's the short and the long.</div>
                              <div class="line">My name is Corporal Nym; I speak and I avouch; 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">true: my name is Nym and Falstaff loves your wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu. I love not the humour of bread and cheese,</div>
                              <div class="line">and there's the humour of it. Adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">'The humour of it,' quoth a'! here's a fellow</div>
                              <div class="line">frights English out of his wits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I will seek out Falstaff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I never heard such a drawling, affecting rogue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do find it: well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not believe such a Cataian, though the priest</div>
                              <div class="line">o' the town commended him for a true man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas a good sensible fellow: well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, Meg!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>MISTRESS PAGE and MISTRESS FORD come forward</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither go you, George? Hark you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, sweet Frank! why art thou melancholy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I melancholy! I am not melancholy. Get you home, go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, thou hast some crotchets in thy head. Now,</div>
                              <div class="line">will you go, Mistress Page?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you. You'll come to dinner, George.</div>
                              <p>Aside to MISTRESS FORD</p>
                              <div class="line">Look who comes yonder: she shall be our messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">to this paltry knight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to MISTRESS PAGE</span>  Trust me, I thought on her:</div>
                              <div class="line">she'll fit it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">You are come to see my daughter Anne?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth; and, I pray, how does good Mistress Anne?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Go in with us and see: we have an hour's talk with</div>
                              <div class="line">you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, Master Ford!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">You heard what this knave told me, did you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes: and you heard what the other told me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you think there is truth in them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang 'em, slaves! I do not think the knight would</div>
                              <div class="line">offer it: but these that accuse him in his intent</div>
                              <div class="line">towards our wives are a yoke of his discarded men;</div>
                              <div class="line">very rogues, now they be out of service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Were they his men?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, were they.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I like it never the better for that. Does he lie at</div>
                              <div class="line">the Garter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, does he. If he should intend this voyage</div>
                              <div class="line">towards my wife, I would turn her loose to him; and</div>
                              <div class="line">what he gets more of her than sharp words, let it</div>
                              <div class="line">lie on my head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not misdoubt my wife; but I would be loath to</div>
                              <div class="line">turn them together. A man may be too confident: I</div>
                              <div class="line">would have nothing lie on my head: I cannot be thus satisfied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Look where my ranting host of the Garter comes:</div>
                              <div class="line">there is either liquor in his pate or money in his</div>
                              <div class="line">purse when he looks so merrily.</div>
                              <p>Enter Host</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, mine host!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, bully-rook! thou'rt a gentleman.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cavaleiro-justice, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SHALLOW</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I follow, mine host, I follow. Good even and</div>
                              <div class="line">twenty, good Master Page! Master Page, will you go</div>
                              <div class="line">with us? we have sport in hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell him, cavaleiro-justice; tell him, bully-rook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, there is a fray to be fought between Sir Hugh</div>
                              <div class="line">the Welsh priest and Caius the French doctor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Good mine host o' the Garter, a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Drawing him aside</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What sayest thou, my bully-rook?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To PAGE</span>  Will you go with us to behold it? My</div>
                              <div class="line">merry host hath had the measuring of their weapons;</div>
                              <div class="line">and, I think, hath appointed them contrary places;</div>
                              <div class="line">for, believe me, I hear the parson is no jester.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, I will tell you what our sport shall be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They converse apart</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast thou no suit against my knight, my</div>
                              <div class="line">guest-cavaleire?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">None, I protest: but I'll give you a pottle of</div>
                              <div class="line">burnt sack to give me recourse to him and tell him</div>
                              <div class="line">my name is Brook; only for a jest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">My hand, bully; thou shalt have egress and regress;</div>
                              <div class="line">--said I well?--and thy name shall be Brook. It is</div>
                              <div class="line">a merry knight. Will you go, An-heires?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you, mine host.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I have heard the Frenchman hath good skill in</div>
                              <div class="line">his rapier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Tut, sir, I could have told you more. In these times</div>
                              <div class="line">you stand on distance, your passes, stoccadoes, and</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not what: 'tis the heart, Master Page; 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">here, 'tis here. I have seen the time, with my long</div>
                              <div class="line">sword I would have made you four tall fellows skip like rats.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, boys, here, here! shall we wag?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you. I would rather hear them scold than fight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Host, SHALLOW, and PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Though Page be a secure fool, an stands so firmly</div>
                              <div class="line">on his wife's frailty, yet I cannot put off my</div>
                              <div class="line">opinion so easily: she was in his company at Page's</div>
                              <div class="line">house; and what they made there, I know not. Well,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will look further into't: and I have a disguise</div>
                              <div class="line">to sound Falstaff. If I find her honest, I lose not</div>
                              <div class="line">my labour; if she be otherwise, 'tis labour well bestowed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF and PISTOL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not lend thee a penny.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then the world's mine oyster.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I with sword will open.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a penny. I have been content, sir, you should</div>
                              <div class="line">lay my countenance to pawn; I have grated upon my</div>
                              <div class="line">good friends for three reprieves for you and your</div>
                              <div class="line">coach-fellow Nym; or else you had looked through</div>
                              <div class="line">the grate, like a geminy of baboons. I am damned in</div>
                              <div class="line">hell for swearing to gentlemen my friends, you were</div>
                              <div class="line">good soldiers and tall fellows; and when Mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Bridget lost the handle of her fan, I took't upon</div>
                              <div class="line">mine honour thou hadst it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst not thou share? hadst thou not fifteen pence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Reason, you rogue, reason: thinkest thou I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">endanger my soul gratis? At a word, hang no more</div>
                              <div class="line">about me, I am no gibbet for you. Go. A short knife</div>
                              <div class="line">and a throng! To your manor of Pickt-hatch! Go.</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll not bear a letter for me, you rogue! you</div>
                              <div class="line">stand upon your honour! Why, thou unconfinable</div>
                              <div class="line">baseness, it is as much as I can do to keep the</div>
                              <div class="line">terms of my honour precise: I, I, I myself</div>
                              <div class="line">sometimes, leaving the fear of God on the left hand</div>
                              <div class="line">and hiding mine honour in my necessity, am fain to</div>
                              <div class="line">shuffle, to hedge and to lurch; and yet you, rogue,</div>
                              <div class="line">will ensconce your rags, your cat-a-mountain</div>
                              <div class="line">looks, your red-lattice phrases, and your</div>
                              <div class="line">bold-beating oaths, under the shelter of your</div>
                              <div class="line">honour! You will not do it, you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">I do relent: what would thou more of man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, here's a woman would speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Let her approach.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Give your worship good morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, good wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so, an't please your worship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good maid, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be sworn,</div>
                              <div class="line">As my mother was, the first hour I was born.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I do believe the swearer. What with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I vouchsafe your worship a word or two?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Two thousand, fair woman: and I'll vouchsafe thee</div>
                              <div class="line">the hearing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">There is one Mistress Ford, sir:--I pray, come a</div>
                              <div class="line">little nearer this ways:--I myself dwell with master</div>
                              <div class="line">Doctor Caius,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, on: Mistress Ford, you say,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Your worship says very true: I pray your worship,</div>
                              <div class="line">come a little nearer this ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant thee, nobody hears; mine own people, mine</div>
                              <div class="line">own people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Are they so? God bless them and make them his servants!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, Mistress Ford; what of her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, she's a good creature. Lord Lord! your</div>
                              <div class="line">worship's a wanton! Well, heaven forgive you and all</div>
                              <div class="line">of us, I pray!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford; come, Mistress Ford,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this is the short and the long of it; you</div>
                              <div class="line">have brought her into such a canaries as 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">wonderful. The best courtier of them all, when the</div>
                              <div class="line">court lay at Windsor, could never have brought her</div>
                              <div class="line">to such a canary. Yet there has been knights, and</div>
                              <div class="line">lords, and gentlemen, with their coaches, I warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">you, coach after coach, letter after letter, gift</div>
                              <div class="line">after gift; smelling so sweetly, all musk, and so</div>
                              <div class="line">rushling, I warrant you, in silk and gold; and in</div>
                              <div class="line">such alligant terms; and in such wine and sugar of</div>
                              <div class="line">the best and the fairest, that would have won any</div>
                              <div class="line">woman's heart; and, I warrant you, they could never</div>
                              <div class="line">get an eye-wink of her: I had myself twenty angels</div>
                              <div class="line">given me this morning; but I defy all angels, in</div>
                              <div class="line">any such sort, as they say, but in the way of</div>
                              <div class="line">honesty: and, I warrant you, they could never get</div>
                              <div class="line">her so much as sip on a cup with the proudest of</div>
                              <div class="line">them all: and yet there has been earls, nay, which</div>
                              <div class="line">is more, pensioners; but, I warrant you, all is one with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">But what says she to me? be brief, my good</div>
                              <div class="line">she-Mercury.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, she hath received your letter, for the which</div>
                              <div class="line">she thanks you a thousand times; and she gives you</div>
                              <div class="line">to notify that her husband will be absence from his</div>
                              <div class="line">house between ten and eleven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten and eleven?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth; and then you may come and see the</div>
                              <div class="line">picture, she says, that you wot of: Master Ford,</div>
                              <div class="line">her husband, will be from home. Alas! the sweet</div>
                              <div class="line">woman leads an ill life with him: he's a very</div>
                              <div class="line">jealousy man: she leads a very frampold life with</div>
                              <div class="line">him, good heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten and eleven. Woman, commend me to her; I will</div>
                              <div class="line">not fail her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, you say well. But I have another messenger to</div>
                              <div class="line">your worship. Mistress Page hath her hearty</div>
                              <div class="line">commendations to you too: and let me tell you in</div>
                              <div class="line">your ear, she's as fartuous a civil modest wife, and</div>
                              <div class="line">one, I tell you, that will not miss you morning nor</div>
                              <div class="line">evening prayer, as any is in Windsor, whoe'er be the</div>
                              <div class="line">other: and she bade me tell your worship that her</div>
                              <div class="line">husband is seldom from home; but she hopes there</div>
                              <div class="line">will come a time. I never knew a woman so dote upon</div>
                              <div class="line">a man: surely I think you have charms, la; yes, in truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I, I assure thee: setting the attractions of my</div>
                              <div class="line">good parts aside I have no other charms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessing on your heart for't!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">But, I pray thee, tell me this: has Ford's wife and</div>
                              <div class="line">Page's wife acquainted each other how they love me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">That were a jest indeed! they have not so little</div>
                              <div class="line">grace, I hope: that were a trick indeed! but</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page would desire you to send her your</div>
                              <div class="line">little page, of all loves: her husband has a</div>
                              <div class="line">marvellous infection to the little page; and truly</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Page is an honest man. Never a wife in</div>
                              <div class="line">Windsor leads a better life than she does: do what</div>
                              <div class="line">she will, say what she will, take all, pay all, go</div>
                              <div class="line">to bed when she list, rise when she list, all is as</div>
                              <div class="line">she will: and truly she deserves it; for if there</div>
                              <div class="line">be a kind woman in Windsor, she is one. You must</div>
                              <div class="line">send her your page; no remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but do so, then: and, look you, he may come and</div>
                              <div class="line">go between you both; and in any case have a</div>
                              <div class="line">nay-word, that you may know one another's mind, and</div>
                              <div class="line">the boy never need to understand any thing; for</div>
                              <div class="line">'tis not good that children should know any</div>
                              <div class="line">wickedness: old folks, you know, have discretion,</div>
                              <div class="line">as they say, and know the world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare thee well: commend me to them both: there's</div>
                              <div class="line">my purse; I am yet thy debtor. Boy, go along with</div>
                              <div class="line">this woman.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt MISTRESS QUICKLY and ROBIN</p>
                              <div class="line">This news distracts me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">This punk is one of Cupid's carriers:</div>
                              <div class="line">Clap on more sails; pursue; up with your fights:</div>
                              <div class="line">Give fire: she is my prize, or ocean whelm them all!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Sayest thou so, old Jack? go thy ways; I'll make</div>
                              <div class="line">more of thy old body than I have done. Will they</div>
                              <div class="line">yet look after thee? Wilt thou, after the expense</div>
                              <div class="line">of so much money, be now a gainer? Good body, I</div>
                              <div class="line">thank thee. Let them say 'tis grossly done; so it be</div>
                              <div class="line">fairly done, no matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, there's one Master Brook below would fain</div>
                              <div class="line">speak with you, and be acquainted with you; and hath</div>
                              <div class="line">sent your worship a morning's draught of sack.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Brook is his name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Call him in.</div>
                              <p>Exit BARDOLPH</p>
                              <div class="line">Such Brooks are welcome to me, that o'erflow such</div>
                              <div class="line">liquor. Ah, ha! Mistress Ford and Mistress Page</div>
                              <div class="line">have I encompassed you? go to; via!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BARDOLPH, with FORD disguised</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless you, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, sir! Would you speak with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I make bold to press with so little preparation upon</div>
                              <div class="line">you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You're welcome. What's your will? Give us leave, drawer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I am a gentleman that have spent much; my name is Brook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Brook, I desire more acquaintance of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Sir John, I sue for yours: not to charge you;</div>
                              <div class="line">for I must let you understand I think myself in</div>
                              <div class="line">better plight for a lender than you are: the which</div>
                              <div class="line">hath something embolden'd me to this unseasoned</div>
                              <div class="line">intrusion; for they say, if money go before, all</div>
                              <div class="line">ways do lie open.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Money is a good soldier, sir, and will on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Troth, and I have a bag of money here troubles me:</div>
                              <div class="line">if you will help to bear it, Sir John, take all, or</div>
                              <div class="line">half, for easing me of the carriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I know not how I may deserve to be your porter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I will tell you, sir, if you will give me the hearing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, good Master Brook: I shall be glad to be</div>
                              <div class="line">your servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I hear you are a scholar,--I will be brief</div>
                              <div class="line">with you,--and you have been a man long known to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">though I had never so good means, as desire, to make</div>
                              <div class="line">myself acquainted with you. I shall discover a</div>
                              <div class="line">thing to you, wherein I must very much lay open mine</div>
                              <div class="line">own imperfection: but, good Sir John, as you have</div>
                              <div class="line">one eye upon my follies, as you hear them unfolded,</div>
                              <div class="line">turn another into the register of your own; that I</div>
                              <div class="line">may pass with a reproof the easier, sith you</div>
                              <div class="line">yourself know how easy it is to be such an offender.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well, sir; proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a gentlewoman in this town; her husband's</div>
                              <div class="line">name is Ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I have long loved her, and, I protest to you,</div>
                              <div class="line">bestowed much on her; followed her with a doting</div>
                              <div class="line">observance; engrossed opportunities to meet her;</div>
                              <div class="line">fee'd every slight occasion that could but niggardly</div>
                              <div class="line">give me sight of her; not only bought many presents</div>
                              <div class="line">to give her, but have given largely to many to know</div>
                              <div class="line">what she would have given; briefly, I have pursued</div>
                              <div class="line">her as love hath pursued me; which hath been on the</div>
                              <div class="line">wing of all occasions. But whatsoever I have</div>
                              <div class="line">merited, either in my mind or, in my means, meed,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure, I have received none; unless experience</div>
                              <div class="line">be a jewel that I have purchased at an infinite</div>
                              <div class="line">rate, and that hath taught me to say this:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Love like a shadow flies when substance love pursues;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursuing that that flies, and flying what pursues.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you received no promise of satisfaction at her hands?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Never.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you importuned her to such a purpose?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Never.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what quality was your love, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a fair house built on another man's ground; so</div>
                              <div class="line">that I have lost my edifice by mistaking the place</div>
                              <div class="line">where I erected it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">To what purpose have you unfolded this to me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
