                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">When I have told you that, I have told you all.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some say, that though she appear honest to me, yet in</div>
                              <div class="line">other places she enlargeth her mirth so far that</div>
                              <div class="line">there is shrewd construction made of her. Now, Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">John, here is the heart of my purpose: you are a</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman of excellent breeding, admirable</div>
                              <div class="line">discourse, of great admittance, authentic in your</div>
                              <div class="line">place and person, generally allowed for your many</div>
                              <div class="line">war-like, court-like, and learned preparations.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe it, for you know it. There is money; spend</div>
                              <div class="line">it, spend it; spend more; spend all I have; only</div>
                              <div class="line">give me so much of your time in exchange of it, as</div>
                              <div class="line">to lay an amiable siege to the honesty of this</div>
                              <div class="line">Ford's wife: use your art of wooing; win her to</div>
                              <div class="line">consent to you: if any man may, you may as soon as</div>
                              <div class="line">any.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Would it apply well to the vehemency of your</div>
                              <div class="line">affection, that I should win what you would enjoy?</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks you prescribe to yourself very preposterously.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">O, understand my drift. She dwells so securely on</div>
                              <div class="line">the excellency of her honour, that the folly of my</div>
                              <div class="line">soul dares not present itself: she is too bright to</div>
                              <div class="line">be looked against. Now, could I could come to her</div>
                              <div class="line">with any detection in my hand, my desires had</div>
                              <div class="line">instance and argument to commend themselves: I</div>
                              <div class="line">could drive her then from the ward of her purity,</div>
                              <div class="line">her reputation, her marriage-vow, and a thousand</div>
                              <div class="line">other her defences, which now are too too strongly</div>
                              <div class="line">embattled against me. What say you to't, Sir John?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Brook, I will first make bold with your</div>
                              <div class="line">money; next, give me your hand; and last, as I am a</div>
                              <div class="line">gentleman, you shall, if you will, enjoy Ford's wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">O good sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I say you shall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Want no money, Sir John; you shall want none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Want no Mistress Ford, Master Brook; you shall want</div>
                              <div class="line">none. I shall be with her, I may tell you, by her</div>
                              <div class="line">own appointment; even as you came in to me, her</div>
                              <div class="line">assistant or go-between parted from me: I say I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall be with her between ten and eleven; for at</div>
                              <div class="line">that time the jealous rascally knave her husband</div>
                              <div class="line">will be forth. Come you to me at night; you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">know how I speed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I am blest in your acquaintance. Do you know Ford,</div>
                              <div class="line">sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, poor cuckoldly knave! I know him not:</div>
                              <div class="line">yet I wrong him to call him poor; they say the</div>
                              <div class="line">jealous wittolly knave hath masses of money; for the</div>
                              <div class="line">which his wife seems to me well-favored. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">use her as the key of the cuckoldly rogue's coffer;</div>
                              <div class="line">and there's my harvest-home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I would you knew Ford, sir, that you might avoid him</div>
                              <div class="line">if you saw him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, mechanical salt-butter rogue! I will</div>
                              <div class="line">stare him out of his wits; I will awe him with my</div>
                              <div class="line">cudgel: it shall hang like a meteor o'er the</div>
                              <div class="line">cuckold's horns. Master Brook, thou shalt know I</div>
                              <div class="line">will predominate over the peasant, and thou shalt</div>
                              <div class="line">lie with his wife. Come to me soon at night.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ford's a knave, and I will aggravate his style;</div>
                              <div class="line">thou, Master Brook, shalt know him for knave and</div>
                              <div class="line">cuckold. Come to me soon at night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What a damned Epicurean rascal is this! My heart is</div>
                              <div class="line">ready to crack with impatience. Who says this is</div>
                              <div class="line">improvident jealousy? my wife hath sent to him; the</div>
                              <div class="line">hour is fixed; the match is made. Would any man</div>
                              <div class="line">have thought this? See the hell of having a false</div>
                              <div class="line">woman! My bed shall be abused, my coffers</div>
                              <div class="line">ransacked, my reputation gnawn at; and I shall not</div>
                              <div class="line">only receive this villanous wrong, but stand under</div>
                              <div class="line">the adoption of abominable terms, and by him that</div>
                              <div class="line">does me this wrong. Terms! names! Amaimon sounds</div>
                              <div class="line">well; Lucifer, well; Barbason, well; yet they are</div>
                              <div class="line">devils' additions, the names of fiends: but</div>
                              <div class="line">Cuckold! Wittol!--Cuckold! the devil himself hath</div>
                              <div class="line">not such a name. Page is an ass, a secure ass: he</div>
                              <div class="line">will trust his wife; he will not be jealous. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">rather trust a Fleming with my butter, Parson Hugh</div>
                              <div class="line">the Welshman with my cheese, an Irishman with my</div>
                              <div class="line">aqua-vitae bottle, or a thief to walk my ambling</div>
                              <div class="line">gelding, than my wife with herself; then she plots,</div>
                              <div class="line">then she ruminates, then she devises; and what they</div>
                              <div class="line">think in their hearts they may effect, they will</div>
                              <div class="line">break their hearts but they will effect. God be</div>
                              <div class="line">praised for my jealousy! Eleven o'clock the hour.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will prevent this, detect my wife, be revenged on</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff, and laugh at Page. I will about it;</div>
                              <div class="line">better three hours too soon than a minute too late.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie, fie! cuckold! cuckold! cuckold!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A field near Windsor.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DOCTOR CAIUS and RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Jack Rugby!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vat is de clock, Jack?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis past the hour, sir, that Sir Hugh promised to meet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, he has save his soul, dat he is no come; he</div>
                              <div class="line">has pray his Pible well, dat he is no come: by gar,</div>
                              <div class="line">Jack Rugby, he is dead already, if he be come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">He is wise, sir; he knew your worship would kill</div>
                              <div class="line">him, if he came.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, de herring is no dead so as I vill kill him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Take your rapier, Jack; I vill tell you how I vill kill him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, sir, I cannot fence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Villany, take your rapier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RUGBY</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbear; here's company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Host, SHALLOW, SLENDER, and PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless thee, bully doctor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you, Master Doctor Caius!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good master doctor!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Give you good morrow, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vat be all you, one, two, tree, four, come for?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">To see thee fight, to see thee foin, to see thee</div>
                              <div class="line">traverse; to see thee here, to see thee there; to</div>
                              <div class="line">see thee pass thy punto, thy stock, thy reverse, thy</div>
                              <div class="line">distance, thy montant. Is he dead, my Ethiopian? is</div>
                              <div class="line">he dead, my Francisco? ha, bully! What says my</div>
                              <div class="line">AEsculapius? my Galen? my heart of elder? ha! is</div>
                              <div class="line">he dead, bully stale? is he dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, he is de coward Jack priest of de vorld; he</div>
                              <div class="line">is not show his face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a Castalion-King-Urinal. Hector of Greece, my boy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, bear vitness that me have stay six or</div>
                              <div class="line">seven, two, tree hours for him, and he is no come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He is the wiser man, master doctor: he is a curer of</div>
                              <div class="line">souls, and you a curer of bodies; if you should</div>
                              <div class="line">fight, you go against the hair of your professions.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it not true, Master Page?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Shallow, you have yourself been a great</div>
                              <div class="line">fighter, though now a man of peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Bodykins, Master Page, though I now be old and of</div>
                              <div class="line">the peace, if I see a sword out, my finger itches to</div>
                              <div class="line">make one. Though we are justices and doctors and</div>
                              <div class="line">churchmen, Master Page, we have some salt of our</div>
                              <div class="line">youth in us; we are the sons of women, Master Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true, Master Shallow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">It will be found so, Master Page. Master Doctor</div>
                              <div class="line">Caius, I am come to fetch you home. I am sworn of</div>
                              <div class="line">the peace: you have showed yourself a wise</div>
                              <div class="line">physician, and Sir Hugh hath shown himself a wise</div>
                              <div class="line">and patient churchman. You must go with me, master doctor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, guest-justice. A word, Mounseur Mockwater.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mock-vater! vat is dat?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Mock-water, in our English tongue, is valour, bully.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, den, I have as mush mock-vater as de</div>
                              <div class="line">Englishman. Scurvy jack-dog priest! by gar, me</div>
                              <div class="line">vill cut his ears.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">He will clapper-claw thee tightly, bully.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Clapper-de-claw! vat is dat?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">That is, he will make thee amends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, me do look he shall clapper-de-claw me;</div>
                              <div class="line">for, by gar, me vill have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will provoke him to't, or let him wag.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Me tank you for dat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">And, moreover, bully,--but first, master guest, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Page, and eke Cavaleiro Slender, go you</div>
                              <div class="line">through the town to Frogmore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Aside to them</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Hugh is there, is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">He is there: see what humour he is in; and I will</div>
                              <div class="line">bring the doctor about by the fields. Will it do well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">We will do it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu, good master doctor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PAGE, SHALLOW, and SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, me vill kill de priest; for he speak for a</div>
                              <div class="line">jack-an-ape to Anne Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him die: sheathe thy impatience, throw cold</div>
                              <div class="line">water on thy choler: go about the fields with me</div>
                              <div class="line">through Frogmore: I will bring thee where Mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Anne Page is, at a farm-house a-feasting; and thou</div>
                              <div class="line">shalt woo her. Cried I aim? said I well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, me dank you for dat: by gar, I love you;</div>
                              <div class="line">and I shall procure-a you de good guest, de earl,</div>
                              <div class="line">de knight, de lords, de gentlemen, my patients.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">For the which I will be thy adversary toward Anne</div>
                              <div class="line">Page. Said I well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, 'tis good; vell said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us wag, then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come at my heels, Jack Rugby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A field near Frogmore.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in PAGE'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A field near Frogmore.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS and SIMPLE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you now, good master Slender's serving-man,</div>
                              <div class="line">and friend Simple by your name, which way have you</div>
                              <div class="line">looked for Master Caius, that calls himself doctor of physic?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, the pittie-ward, the park-ward, every</div>
                              <div class="line">way; old Windsor way, and every way but the town</div>
                              <div class="line">way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">I most fehemently desire you you will also look that</div>
                              <div class="line">way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Pless my soul, how full of chollors I am, and</div>
                              <div class="line">trempling of mind! I shall be glad if he have</div>
                              <div class="line">deceived me. How melancholies I am! I will knog</div>
                              <div class="line">his urinals about his knave's costard when I have</div>
                              <div class="line">good opportunities for the ork. 'Pless my soul!</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">To shallow rivers, to whose falls</div>
                              <div class="line">Melodious birds sings madrigals;</div>
                              <div class="line">There will we make our peds of roses,</div>
                              <div class="line">And a thousand fragrant posies.</div>
                              <div class="line">To shallow--</div>
                              <div class="line">Mercy on me! I have a great dispositions to cry.</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">Melodious birds sing madrigals--</div>
                              <div class="line">When as I sat in Pabylon--</div>
                              <div class="line">And a thousand vagram posies.</div>
                              <div class="line">To shallow &c.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter SIMPLE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder he is coming, this way, Sir Hugh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">He's welcome.</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">To shallow rivers, to whose falls-</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven prosper the right! What weapons is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">No weapons, sir. There comes my master, Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Shallow, and another gentleman, from Frogmore, over</div>
                              <div class="line">the stile, this way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, give me my gown; or else keep it in your arms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, and SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, master Parson! Good morrow, good Sir Hugh.</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep a gamester from the dice, and a good student</div>
                              <div class="line">from his book, and it is wonderful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Ah, sweet Anne Page!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Save you, good Sir Hugh!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Pless you from his mercy sake, all of you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">What, the sword and the word! do you study them</div>
                              <div class="line">both, master parson?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">And youthful still! in your doublet and hose this</div>
                              <div class="line">raw rheumatic day!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">There is reasons and causes for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">We are come to you to do a good office, master parson.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fery well: what is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder is a most reverend gentleman, who, belike</div>
                              <div class="line">having received wrong by some person, is at most</div>
                              <div class="line">odds with his own gravity and patience that ever you</div>
                              <div class="line">saw.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I have lived fourscore years and upward; I never</div>
                              <div class="line">heard a man of his place, gravity and learning, so</div>
                              <div class="line">wide of his own respect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I think you know him; Master Doctor Caius, the</div>
                              <div class="line">renowned French physician.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Got's will, and his passion of my heart! I had as</div>
                              <div class="line">lief you would tell me of a mess of porridge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">He has no more knowledge in Hibocrates and Galen,</div>
                              <div class="line">--and he is a knave besides; a cowardly knave as you</div>
                              <div class="line">would desires to be acquainted withal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant you, he's the man should fight with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  O sweet Anne Page!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">It appears so by his weapons. Keep them asunder:</div>
                              <div class="line">here comes Doctor Caius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Host, DOCTOR CAIUS, and RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good master parson, keep in your weapon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">So do you, good master doctor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Disarm them, and let them question: let them keep</div>
                              <div class="line">their limbs whole and hack our English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, let-a me speak a word with your ear.</div>
                              <div class="line">Vherefore vill you not meet-a me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to DOCTOR CAIUS</span>  Pray you, use your patience:</div>
                              <div class="line">in good time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, you are de coward, de Jack dog, John ape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to DOCTOR CAIUS</span>  Pray you let us not be</div>
                              <div class="line">laughing-stocks to other men's humours; I desire you</div>
                              <div class="line">in friendship, and I will one way or other make you amends.</div>
                              <p>Aloud</p>
                              <div class="line">I will knog your urinals about your knave's cockscomb</div>
                              <div class="line">for missing your meetings and appointments.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Diable! Jack Rugby,--mine host de Jarteer,--have I</div>
                              <div class="line">not stay for him to kill him? have I not, at de place</div>
                              <div class="line">I did appoint?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">As I am a Christians soul now, look you, this is the</div>
                              <div class="line">place appointed: I'll be judgement by mine host of</div>
                              <div class="line">the Garter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, I say, Gallia and Gaul, French and Welsh,</div>
                              <div class="line">soul-curer and body-curer!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, dat is very good; excellent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, I say! hear mine host of the Garter. Am I</div>
                              <div class="line">politic? am I subtle? am I a Machiavel? Shall I</div>
                              <div class="line">lose my doctor? no; he gives me the potions and the</div>
                              <div class="line">motions. Shall I lose my parson, my priest, my Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">Hugh? no; he gives me the proverbs and the</div>
                              <div class="line">no-verbs. Give me thy hand, terrestrial; so. Give me</div>
                              <div class="line">thy hand, celestial; so. Boys of art, I have</div>
                              <div class="line">deceived you both; I have directed you to wrong</div>
                              <div class="line">places: your hearts are mighty, your skins are</div>
                              <div class="line">whole, and let burnt sack be the issue. Come, lay</div>
                              <div class="line">their swords to pawn. Follow me, lads of peace;</div>
                              <div class="line">follow, follow, follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust me, a mad host. Follow, gentlemen, follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  O sweet Anne Page!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt SHALLOW, SLENDER, PAGE, and Host</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, do I perceive dat? have you make-a de sot of</div>
                              <div class="line">us, ha, ha?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">This is well; he has made us his vlouting-stog. I</div>
                              <div class="line">desire you that we may be friends; and let us knog</div>
                              <div class="line">our prains together to be revenge on this same</div>
                              <div class="line">scall, scurvy cogging companion, the host of the Garter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, with all my heart. He promise to bring me</div>
                              <div class="line">where is Anne Page; by gar, he deceive me too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will smite his noddles. Pray you, follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, keep your way, little gallant; you were wont to</div>
                              <div class="line">be a follower, but now you are a leader. Whether</div>
                              <div class="line">had you rather lead mine eyes, or eye your master's heels?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather, forsooth, go before you like a man</div>
                              <div class="line">than follow him like a dwarf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">O, you are a flattering boy: now I see you'll be a courtier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FORD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well met, Mistress Page. Whither go you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, sir, to see your wife. Is she at home?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; and as idle as she may hang together, for want</div>
                              <div class="line">of company. I think, if your husbands were dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">you two would marry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Be sure of that,--two other husbands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Where had you this pretty weather-cock?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot tell what the dickens his name is my</div>
                              <div class="line">husband had him of. What do you call your knight's</div>
                              <div class="line">name, sirrah?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John Falstaff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John Falstaff!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">He, he; I can never hit on's name. There is such a</div>
                              <div class="line">league between my good man and he! Is your wife at</div>
                              <div class="line">home indeed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed she is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">By your leave, sir: I am sick till I see her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Has Page any brains? hath he any eyes? hath he any</div>
                              <div class="line">thinking? Sure, they sleep; he hath no use of them.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this boy will carry a letter twenty mile, as</div>
                              <div class="line">easy as a cannon will shoot point-blank twelve</div>
                              <div class="line">score. He pieces out his wife's inclination; he</div>
                              <div class="line">gives her folly motion and advantage: and now she's</div>
                              <div class="line">going to my wife, and Falstaff's boy with her. A</div>
                              <div class="line">man may hear this shower sing in the wind. And</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff's boy with her! Good plots, they are laid;</div>
                              <div class="line">and our revolted wives share damnation together.</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; I will take him, then torture my wife, pluck</div>
                              <div class="line">the borrowed veil of modesty from the so seeming</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page, divulge Page himself for a secure and</div>
                              <div class="line">wilful Actaeon; and to these violent proceedings all</div>
                              <div class="line">my neighbours shall cry aim.</div>
                              <p>Clock heard</p>
                              <div class="line">The clock gives me my cue, and my assurance bids me</div>
                              <div class="line">search: there I shall find Falstaff: I shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">rather praised for this than mocked; for it is as</div>
                              <div class="line">positive as the earth is firm that Falstaff is</div>
                              <div class="line">there: I will go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, SLENDER, Host,
SIR HUGH EVANS, DOCTOR CAIUS, and RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well met, Master Ford.</div>
                              <div class="line">&c.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust me, a good knot: I have good cheer at home;</div>
                              <div class="line">and I pray you all go with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I must excuse myself, Master Ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">And so must I, sir: we have appointed to dine with</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne, and I would not break with her for</div>
                              <div class="line">more money than I'll speak of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">We have lingered about a match between Anne Page and</div>
                              <div class="line">my cousin Slender, and this day we shall have our answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope I have your good will, father Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">You have, Master Slender; I stand wholly for you:</div>
                              <div class="line">but my wife, master doctor, is for you altogether.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, be-gar; and de maid is love-a me: my nursh-a</div>
                              <div class="line">Quickly tell me so mush.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you to young Master Fenton? he capers, he</div>
                              <div class="line">dances, he has eyes of youth, he writes verses, he</div>
                              <div class="line">speaks holiday, he smells April and May: he will</div>
                              <div class="line">carry't, he will carry't; 'tis in his buttons; he</div>
                              <div class="line">will carry't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Not by my consent, I promise you. The gentleman is</div>
                              <div class="line">of no having: he kept company with the wild prince</div>
                              <div class="line">and Poins; he is of too high a region; he knows too</div>
                              <div class="line">much. No, he shall not knit a knot in his fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">with the finger of my substance: if he take her,</div>
                              <div class="line">let him take her simply; the wealth I have waits on</div>
                              <div class="line">my consent, and my consent goes not that way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you heartily, some of you go home with me</div>
                              <div class="line">to dinner: besides your cheer, you shall have</div>
                              <div class="line">sport; I will show you a monster. Master doctor,</div>
                              <div class="line">you shall go; so shall you, Master Page; and you, Sir Hugh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, fare you well: we shall have the freer wooing</div>
                              <div class="line">at Master Page's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt SHALLOW, and SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go home, John Rugby; I come anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit RUGBY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, my hearts: I will to my honest knight</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff, and drink canary with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I think I shall drink in pipe wine first</div>
                              <div class="line">with him; I'll make him dance. Will you go, gentles?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you to see this monster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in FORD'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What, John! What, Robert!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Quickly, quickly! is the buck-basket--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant. What, Robin, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Servants with a basket</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, set it down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Give your men the charge; we must be brief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, as I told you before, John and Robert, be</div>
                              <div class="line">ready here hard by in the brew-house: and when I</div>
                              <div class="line">suddenly call you, come forth, and without any pause</div>
                              <div class="line">or staggering take this basket on your shoulders:</div>
                              <div class="line">that done, trudge with it in all haste, and carry</div>
                              <div class="line">it among the whitsters in Datchet-mead, and there</div>
                              <div class="line">empty it in the muddy ditch close by the Thames side.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">You will do it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I ha' told them over and over; they lack no</div>
                              <div class="line">direction. Be gone, and come when you are called.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes little Robin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ROBIN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my eyas-musket! what news with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">My master, Sir John, is come in at your back-door,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford, and requests your company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">You little Jack-a-Lent, have you been true to us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, I'll be sworn. My master knows not of your</div>
                              <div class="line">being here and hath threatened to put me into</div>
                              <div class="line">everlasting liberty if I tell you of it; for he</div>
                              <div class="line">swears he'll turn me away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt a good boy: this secrecy of thine shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">a tailor to thee and shall make thee a new doublet</div>
                              <div class="line">and hose. I'll go hide me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so. Go tell thy master I am alone.</div>
                              <p>Exit ROBIN</p>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page, remember you your cue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant thee; if I do not act it, hiss me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, then: we'll use this unwholesome humidity,</div>
                              <div class="line">this gross watery pumpion; we'll teach him to know</div>
                              <div class="line">turtles from jays.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I caught thee, my heavenly jewel? Why, now let</div>
                              <div class="line">me die, for I have lived long enough: this is the</div>
                              <div class="line">period of my ambition: O this blessed hour!</div>
                           </div>
