                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">O sweet Sir John!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford, I cannot cog, I cannot prate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford. Now shall I sin in my wish: I would</div>
                              <div class="line">thy husband were dead: I'll speak it before the</div>
                              <div class="line">best lord; I would make thee my lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I your lady, Sir John! alas, I should be a pitiful lady!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the court of France show me such another. I see</div>
                              <div class="line">how thine eye would emulate the diamond: thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">the right arched beauty of the brow that becomes the</div>
                              <div class="line">ship-tire, the tire-valiant, or any tire of</div>
                              <div class="line">Venetian admittance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">A plain kerchief, Sir John: my brows become nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">else; nor that well neither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">By the Lord, thou art a traitor to say so: thou</div>
                              <div class="line">wouldst make an absolute courtier; and the firm</div>
                              <div class="line">fixture of thy foot would give an excellent motion</div>
                              <div class="line">to thy gait in a semi-circled farthingale. I see</div>
                              <div class="line">what thou wert, if Fortune thy foe were not, Nature</div>
                              <div class="line">thy friend. Come, thou canst not hide it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, there is no such thing in me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What made me love thee? let that persuade thee</div>
                              <div class="line">there's something extraordinary in thee. Come, I</div>
                              <div class="line">cannot cog and say thou art this and that, like a</div>
                              <div class="line">many of these lisping hawthorn-buds, that come like</div>
                              <div class="line">women in men's apparel, and smell like Bucklersbury</div>
                              <div class="line">in simple time; I cannot: but I love thee; none</div>
                              <div class="line">but thee; and thou deservest it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not betray me, sir. I fear you love Mistress Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou mightst as well say I love to walk by the</div>
                              <div class="line">Counter-gate, which is as hateful to me as the reek</div>
                              <div class="line">of a lime-kiln.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, heaven knows how I love you; and you shall one</div>
                              <div class="line">day find it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep in that mind; I'll deserve it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I must tell you, so you do; or else I could not</div>
                              <div class="line">be in that mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROBIN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Mistress Ford, Mistress Ford! here's</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page at the door, sweating and blowing and</div>
                              <div class="line">looking wildly, and would needs speak with you presently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">She shall not see me: I will ensconce me behind the arras.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, do so: she's a very tattling woman.</div>
                              <p>FALSTAFF hides himself</p>
                              <p>Re-enter MISTRESS PAGE and ROBIN</p>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter? how now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">O Mistress Ford, what have you done? You're shamed,</div>
                              <div class="line">you're overthrown, you're undone for ever!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, good Mistress Page?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">O well-a-day, Mistress Ford! having an honest man</div>
                              <div class="line">to your husband, to give him such cause of suspicion!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What cause of suspicion?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What cause of suspicion! Out pon you! how am I</div>
                              <div class="line">mistook in you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, alas, what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Your husband's coming hither, woman, with all the</div>
                              <div class="line">officers in Windsor, to search for a gentleman that</div>
                              <div class="line">he says is here now in the house by your consent, to</div>
                              <div class="line">take an ill advantage of his assence: you are undone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not so, I hope.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heaven it be not so, that you have such a man</div>
                              <div class="line">here! but 'tis most certain your husband's coming,</div>
                              <div class="line">with half Windsor at his heels, to search for such a</div>
                              <div class="line">one. I come before to tell you. If you know</div>
                              <div class="line">yourself clear, why, I am glad of it; but if you</div>
                              <div class="line">have a friend here convey, convey him out. Be not</div>
                              <div class="line">amazed; call all your senses to you; defend your</div>
                              <div class="line">reputation, or bid farewell to your good life for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall I do? There is a gentleman my dear</div>
                              <div class="line">friend; and I fear not mine own shame so much as his</div>
                              <div class="line">peril: I had rather than a thousand pound he were</div>
                              <div class="line">out of the house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">For shame! never stand 'you had rather' and 'you</div>
                              <div class="line">had rather:' your husband's here at hand, bethink</div>
                              <div class="line">you of some conveyance: in the house you cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">hide him. O, how have you deceived me! Look, here</div>
                              <div class="line">is a basket: if he be of any reasonable stature, he</div>
                              <div class="line">may creep in here; and throw foul linen upon him, as</div>
                              <div class="line">if it were going to bucking: or--it is whiting-time</div>
                              <div class="line">--send him by your two men to Datchet-mead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">He's too big to go in there. What shall I do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Coming forward</span>  Let me see't, let me see't, O, let</div>
                              <div class="line">me see't! I'll in, I'll in. Follow your friend's</div>
                              <div class="line">counsel. I'll in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, Sir John Falstaff! Are these your letters, knight?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee. Help me away. Let me creep in here.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll never--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Gets into the basket; they cover him with foul linen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Help to cover your master, boy. Call your men,</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford. You dissembling knight!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What, John! Robert! John!</div>
                              <p>Exit ROBIN</p>
                              <p>Re-enter Servants</p>
                              <div class="line">Go take up these clothes here quickly. Where's the</div>
                              <div class="line">cowl-staff? look, how you drumble! Carry them to</div>
                              <div class="line">the laundress in Datchet-meat; quickly, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FORD, PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, come near: if I suspect without cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">why then make sport at me; then let me be your jest;</div>
                              <div class="line">I deserve it. How now! whither bear you this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">To the laundress, forsooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what have you to do whither they bear it? You</div>
                              <div class="line">were best meddle with buck-washing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Buck! I would I could wash myself of the buck!</div>
                              <div class="line">Buck, buck, buck! Ay, buck; I warrant you, buck;</div>
                              <div class="line">and of the season too, it shall appear.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt Servants with the basket</p>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen, I have dreamed to-night; I'll tell you my</div>
                              <div class="line">dream. Here, here, here be my keys: ascend my</div>
                              <div class="line">chambers; search, seek, find out: I'll warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">we'll unkennel the fox. Let me stop this way first.</div>
                              <p>Locking the door</p>
                              <div class="line">So, now uncape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Ford, be contented: you wrong yourself too much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">True, Master Page. Up, gentlemen: you shall see</div>
                              <div class="line">sport anon: follow me, gentlemen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">This is fery fantastical humours and jealousies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, 'tis no the fashion of France; it is not</div>
                              <div class="line">jealous in France.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, follow him, gentlemen; see the issue of his search.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there not a double excellency in this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not which pleases me better, that my husband</div>
                              <div class="line">is deceived, or Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What a taking was he in when your husband asked who</div>
                              <div class="line">was in the basket!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I am half afraid he will have need of washing; so</div>
                              <div class="line">throwing him into the water will do him a benefit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, dishonest rascal! I would all of the same</div>
                              <div class="line">strain were in the same distress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I think my husband hath some special suspicion of</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff's being here; for I never saw him so gross</div>
                              <div class="line">in his jealousy till now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I will lay a plot to try that; and we will yet have</div>
                              <div class="line">more tricks with Falstaff: his dissolute disease will</div>
                              <div class="line">scarce obey this medicine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we send that foolish carrion, Mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Quickly, to him, and excuse his throwing into the</div>
                              <div class="line">water; and give him another hope, to betray him to</div>
                              <div class="line">another punishment?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">We will do it: let him be sent for to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">eight o'clock, to have amends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter FORD, PAGE, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot find him: may be the knave bragged of that</div>
                              <div class="line">he could not compass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to MISTRESS FORD</span>  Heard you that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">You use me well, Master Ford, do you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, I do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven make you better than your thoughts!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">You do yourself mighty wrong, Master Ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, ay; I must bear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">If there be any pody in the house, and in the</div>
                              <div class="line">chambers, and in the coffers, and in the presses,</div>
                              <div class="line">heaven forgive my sins at the day of judgment!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, nor I too: there is no bodies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie, Master Ford! are you not ashamed? What</div>
                              <div class="line">spirit, what devil suggests this imagination? I</div>
                              <div class="line">would not ha' your distemper in this kind for the</div>
                              <div class="line">wealth of Windsor Castle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis my fault, Master Page: I suffer for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">You suffer for a pad conscience: your wife is as</div>
                              <div class="line">honest a 'omans as I will desires among five</div>
                              <div class="line">thousand, and five hundred too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By gar, I see 'tis an honest woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I promised you a dinner. Come, come, walk in</div>
                              <div class="line">the Park: I pray you, pardon me; I will hereafter</div>
                              <div class="line">make known to you why I have done this. Come,</div>
                              <div class="line">wife; come, Mistress Page. I pray you, pardon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">pray heartily, pardon me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's go in, gentlemen; but, trust me, we'll mock</div>
                              <div class="line">him. I do invite you to-morrow morning to my house</div>
                              <div class="line">to breakfast: after, we'll a-birding together; I</div>
                              <div class="line">have a fine hawk for the bush. Shall it be so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Any thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">If there is one, I shall make two in the company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If dere be one or two, I shall make-a the turd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, go, Master Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you now, remembrance tomorrow on the lousy</div>
                              <div class="line">knave, mine host.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dat is good; by gar, with all my heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">A lousy knave, to have his gibes and his mockeries!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in PAGE'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FENTON and ANNE PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">I see I cannot get thy father's love;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore no more turn me to him, sweet Nan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, how then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, thou must be thyself.</div>
                              <div class="line">He doth object I am too great of birth--,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that, my state being gall'd with my expense,</div>
                              <div class="line">I seek to heal it only by his wealth:</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides these, other bars he lays before me,</div>
                              <div class="line">My riots past, my wild societies;</div>
                              <div class="line">And tells me 'tis a thing impossible</div>
                              <div class="line">I should love thee but as a property.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">May be he tells you true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">No, heaven so speed me in my time to come!</div>
                              <div class="line">Albeit I will confess thy father's wealth</div>
                              <div class="line">Was the first motive that I woo'd thee, Anne:</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, wooing thee, I found thee of more value</div>
                              <div class="line">Than stamps in gold or sums in sealed bags;</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'tis the very riches of thyself</div>
                              <div class="line">That now I aim at.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle Master Fenton,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet seek my father's love; still seek it, sir:</div>
                              <div class="line">If opportunity and humblest suit</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot attain it, why, then,--hark you hither!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They converse apart</p>
                        <p>Enter SHALLOW, SLENDER, and MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Break their talk, Mistress Quickly: my kinsman shall</div>
                              <div class="line">speak for himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make a shaft or a bolt on't: 'slid, 'tis but</div>
                              <div class="line">venturing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not dismayed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">No, she shall not dismay me: I care not for that,</div>
                              <div class="line">but that I am afeard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark ye; Master Slender would speak a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to him.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">This is my father's choice.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, what a world of vile ill-favor'd faults</div>
                              <div class="line">Looks handsome in three hundred pounds a-year!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">And how does good Master Fenton? Pray you, a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">She's coming; to her, coz. O boy, thou hadst a father!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I had a father, Mistress Anne; my uncle can tell you</div>
                              <div class="line">good jests of him. Pray you, uncle, tell Mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Anne the jest, how my father stole two geese out of</div>
                              <div class="line">a pen, good uncle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Anne, my cousin loves you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that I do; as well as I love any woman in</div>
                              <div class="line">Gloucestershire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He will maintain you like a gentlewoman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that I will, come cut and long-tail, under the</div>
                              <div class="line">degree of a squire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He will make you a hundred and fifty pounds jointure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Shallow, let him woo for himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I thank you for it; I thank you for that good</div>
                              <div class="line">comfort. She calls you, coz: I'll leave you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Master Slender,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good Mistress Anne,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">My will! 'od's heartlings, that's a pretty jest</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed! I ne'er made my will yet, I thank heaven; I</div>
                              <div class="line">am not such a sickly creature, I give heaven praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, Master Slender, what would you with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, for mine own part, I would little or nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">with you. Your father and my uncle hath made</div>
                              <div class="line">motions: if it be my luck, so; if not, happy man be</div>
                              <div class="line">his dole! They can tell you how things go better</div>
                              <div class="line">than I can: you may ask your father; here he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAGE and MISTRESS PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Master Slender: love him, daughter Anne.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now! what does Master Fenton here?</div>
                              <div class="line">You wrong me, sir, thus still to haunt my house:</div>
                              <div class="line">I told you, sir, my daughter is disposed of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, Master Page, be not impatient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Fenton, come not to my child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">She is no match for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, will you hear me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, good Master Fenton.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Master Shallow; come, son Slender, in.</div>
                              <div class="line">Knowing my mind, you wrong me, Master Fenton.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PAGE, SHALLOW, and SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak to Mistress Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Mistress Page, for that I love your daughter</div>
                              <div class="line">In such a righteous fashion as I do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Perforce, against all cheques, rebukes and manners,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must advance the colours of my love</div>
                              <div class="line">And not retire: let me have your good will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good mother, do not marry me to yond fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean it not; I seek you a better husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">That's my master, master doctor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, I had rather be set quick i' the earth</div>
                              <div class="line">And bowl'd to death with turnips!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, trouble not yourself. Good Master Fenton,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not be your friend nor enemy:</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter will I question how she loves you,</div>
                              <div class="line">And as I find her, so am I affected.</div>
                              <div class="line">Till then farewell, sir: she must needs go in;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her father will be angry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, gentle mistress: farewell, Nan.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt MISTRESS PAGE and ANNE PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">This is my doing, now: 'Nay,' said I, 'will you cast</div>
                              <div class="line">away your child on a fool, and a physician? Look on</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Fenton:' this is my doing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee; and I pray thee, once to-night</div>
                              <div class="line">Give my sweet Nan this ring: there's for thy pains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Now heaven send thee good fortune!</div>
                              <p>Exit FENTON</p>
                              <div class="line">A kind heart he hath: a woman would run through</div>
                              <div class="line">fire and water for such a kind heart. But yet I</div>
                              <div class="line">would my master had Mistress Anne; or I would</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Slender had her; or, in sooth, I would Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Fenton had her; I will do what I can for them all</div>
                              <div class="line">three; for so I have promised, and I'll be as good</div>
                              <div class="line">as my word; but speciously for Master Fenton. Well,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must of another errand to Sir John Falstaff from</div>
                              <div class="line">my two mistresses: what a beast am I to slack it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Bardolph, I say,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Go fetch me a quart of sack; put a toast in't.</div>
                              <p>Exit BARDOLPH</p>
                              <div class="line">Have I lived to be carried in a basket, like a</div>
                              <div class="line">barrow of butcher's offal, and to be thrown in the</div>
                              <div class="line">Thames? Well, if I be served such another trick,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have my brains ta'en out and buttered, and give</div>
                              <div class="line">them to a dog for a new-year's gift. The rogues</div>
                              <div class="line">slighted me into the river with as little remorse as</div>
                              <div class="line">they would have drowned a blind bitch's puppies,</div>
                              <div class="line">fifteen i' the litter: and you may know by my size</div>
                              <div class="line">that I have a kind of alacrity in sinking; if the</div>
                              <div class="line">bottom were as deep as hell, I should down. I had</div>
                              <div class="line">been drowned, but that the shore was shelvy and</div>
                              <div class="line">shallow,--a death that I abhor; for the water swells</div>
                              <div class="line">a man; and what a thing should I have been when I</div>
                              <div class="line">had been swelled! I should have been a mountain of mummy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BARDOLPH with sack</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's Mistress Quickly, sir, to speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me pour in some sack to the Thames water; for my</div>
                              <div class="line">belly's as cold as if I had swallowed snowballs for</div>
                              <div class="line">pills to cool the reins. Call her in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Come in, woman!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">By your leave; I cry you mercy: give your worship</div>
                              <div class="line">good morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Take away these chalices. Go brew me a pottle of</div>
                              <div class="line">sack finely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">With eggs, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Simple of itself; I'll no pullet-sperm in my brewage.</div>
                              <p>Exit BARDOLPH</p>
                              <div class="line">How now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I come to your worship from Mistress Ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford! I have had ford enough; I was thrown</div>
                              <div class="line">into the ford; I have my belly full of ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas the day! good heart, that was not her fault:</div>
                              <div class="line">she does so take on with her men; they mistook their erection.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">So did I mine, to build upon a foolish woman's promise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, she laments, sir, for it, that it would yearn</div>
                              <div class="line">your heart to see it. Her husband goes this morning</div>
                              <div class="line">a-birding; she desires you once more to come to her</div>
                              <div class="line">between eight and nine: I must carry her word</div>
                              <div class="line">quickly: she'll make you amends, I warrant you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I will visit her: tell her so; and bid her</div>
                              <div class="line">think what a man is: let her consider his frailty,</div>
                              <div class="line">and then judge of my merit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">I will tell her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so. Between nine and ten, sayest thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Eight and nine, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, be gone: I will not miss her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace be with you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I marvel I hear not of Master Brook; he sent me word</div>
                              <div class="line">to stay within: I like his money well. O, here he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FORD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless you, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, master Brook, you come to know what hath passed</div>
                              <div class="line">between me and Ford's wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">That, indeed, Sir John, is my business.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Brook, I will not lie to you: I was at her</div>
                              <div class="line">house the hour she appointed me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And sped you, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Very ill-favoredly, Master Brook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">How so, sir? Did she change her determination?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Master Brook; but the peaking Cornuto her</div>
                              <div class="line">husband, Master Brook, dwelling in a continual</div>
                              <div class="line">'larum of jealousy, comes me in the instant of our</div>
                              <div class="line">encounter, after we had embraced, kissed, protested,</div>
                              <div class="line">and, as it were, spoke the prologue of our comedy;</div>
                              <div class="line">and at his heels a rabble of his companions, thither</div>
                              <div class="line">provoked and instigated by his distemper, and,</div>
                              <div class="line">forsooth, to search his house for his wife's love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What, while you were there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">While I was there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And did he search for you, and could not find you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall hear. As good luck would have it, comes</div>
                              <div class="line">in one Mistress Page; gives intelligence of Ford's</div>
                              <div class="line">approach; and, in her invention and Ford's wife's</div>
                              <div class="line">distraction, they conveyed me into a buck-basket.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">A buck-basket!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">By the Lord, a buck-basket! rammed me in with foul</div>
                              <div class="line">shirts and smocks, socks, foul stockings, greasy</div>
                              <div class="line">napkins; that, Master Brook, there was the rankest</div>
                              <div class="line">compound of villanous smell that ever offended nostril.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And how long lay you there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, you shall hear, Master Brook, what I have</div>
                              <div class="line">suffered to bring this woman to evil for your good.</div>
                              <div class="line">Being thus crammed in the basket, a couple of Ford's</div>
                              <div class="line">knaves, his hinds, were called forth by their</div>
                              <div class="line">mistress to carry me in the name of foul clothes to</div>
                              <div class="line">Datchet-lane: they took me on their shoulders; met</div>
                              <div class="line">the jealous knave their master in the door, who</div>
                              <div class="line">asked them once or twice what they had in their</div>
                              <div class="line">basket: I quaked for fear, lest the lunatic knave</div>
                              <div class="line">would have searched it; but fate, ordaining he</div>
                              <div class="line">should be a cuckold, held his hand. Well: on went he</div>
                              <div class="line">for a search, and away went I for foul clothes. But</div>
                              <div class="line">mark the sequel, Master Brook: I suffered the pangs</div>
                              <div class="line">of three several deaths; first, an intolerable</div>
                              <div class="line">fright, to be detected with a jealous rotten</div>
                              <div class="line">bell-wether; next, to be compassed, like a good</div>
                              <div class="line">bilbo, in the circumference of a peck, hilt to</div>
                              <div class="line">point, heel to head; and then, to be stopped in,</div>
                              <div class="line">like a strong distillation, with stinking clothes</div>
                              <div class="line">that fretted in their own grease: think of that,--a</div>
                              <div class="line">man of my kidney,--think of that,--that am as subject</div>
                              <div class="line">to heat as butter; a man of continual dissolution</div>
                              <div class="line">and thaw: it was a miracle to scape suffocation.</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the height of this bath, when I was more than</div>
                              <div class="line">half stewed in grease, like a Dutch dish, to be</div>
                              <div class="line">thrown into the Thames, and cooled, glowing hot,</div>
                              <div class="line">in that surge, like a horse-shoe; think of</div>
                              <div class="line">that,--hissing hot,--think of that, Master Brook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">In good sadness, I am sorry that for my sake you</div>
                              <div class="line">have sufferd all this. My suit then is desperate;</div>
                              <div class="line">you'll undertake her no more?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Brook, I will be thrown into Etna, as I have</div>
                              <div class="line">been into Thames, ere I will leave her thus. Her</div>
                              <div class="line">husband is this morning gone a-birding: I have</div>
                              <div class="line">received from her another embassy of meeting; 'twixt</div>
                              <div class="line">eight and nine is the hour, Master Brook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis past eight already, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it? I will then address me to my appointment.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come to me at your convenient leisure, and you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">know how I speed; and the conclusion shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">crowned with your enjoying her. Adieu. You shall</div>
                              <div class="line">have her, Master Brook; Master Brook, you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">cuckold Ford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Hum! ha! is this a vision? is this a dream? do I</div>
                              <div class="line">sleep? Master Ford awake! awake, Master Ford!</div>
                              <div class="line">there's a hole made in your best coat, Master Ford.</div>
                              <div class="line">This 'tis to be married! this 'tis to have linen</div>
                              <div class="line">and buck-baskets! Well, I will proclaim myself</div>
                              <div class="line">what I am: I will now take the lecher; he is at my</div>
                              <div class="line">house; he cannot 'scape me; 'tis impossible he</div>
                              <div class="line">should; he cannot creep into a halfpenny purse,</div>
                              <div class="line">nor into a pepper-box: but, lest the devil that</div>
                              <div class="line">guides him should aid him, I will search</div>
                              <div class="line">impossible places. Though what I am I cannot avoid,</div>
                              <div class="line">yet to be what I would not shall not make me tame:</div>
                              <div class="line">if I have horns to make one mad, let the proverb go</div>
                              <div class="line">with me: I'll be horn-mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
