                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in FORD'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.6">5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.7">6. SCENE VI.  Another room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS QUICKLY, and
WILLIAM PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he at Master Ford's already, think'st thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure he is by this, or will be presently: but,</div>
                              <div class="line">truly, he is very courageous mad about his throwing</div>
                              <div class="line">into the water. Mistress Ford desires you to come suddenly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be with her by and by; I'll but bring my young</div>
                              <div class="line">man here to school. Look, where his master comes;</div>
                              <div class="line">'tis a playing-day, I see.</div>
                              <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Sir Hugh! no school to-day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">No; Master Slender is let the boys leave to play.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessing of his heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir Hugh, my husband says my son profits nothing in</div>
                              <div class="line">the world at his book. I pray you, ask him some</div>
                              <div class="line">questions in his accidence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, William; hold up your head; come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, sirrah; hold up your head; answer your</div>
                              <div class="line">master, be not afraid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">William, how many numbers is in nouns?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Two.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, I thought there had been one number more,</div>
                              <div class="line">because they say, ''Od's nouns.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace your tattlings! What is 'fair,' William?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Pulcher.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Polecats! there are fairer things than polecats, sure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">You are a very simplicity 'oman: I pray you peace.</div>
                              <div class="line">What is 'lapis,' William?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">A stone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">And what is 'a stone,' William?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">A pebble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, it is 'lapis:' I pray you, remember in your prain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Lapis.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">That is a good William. What is he, William, that</div>
                              <div class="line">does lend articles?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Articles are borrowed of the pronoun, and be thus</div>
                              <div class="line">declined, Singulariter, nominativo, hic, haec, hoc.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nominativo, hig, hag, hog; pray you, mark:</div>
                              <div class="line">genitivo, hujus. Well, what is your accusative case?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Accusativo, hinc.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, have your remembrance, child,</div>
                              <div class="line">accusative, hung, hang, hog.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">'Hang-hog' is Latin for bacon, I warrant you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave your prabbles, 'oman. What is the focative</div>
                              <div class="line">case, William?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">O,--vocativo, O.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Remember, William; focative is caret.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's a good root.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Oman, forbear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your genitive case plural, William?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Genitive case!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Genitive,--horum, harum, horum.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Vengeance of Jenny's case! fie on her! never name</div>
                              <div class="line">her, child, if she be a whore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">For shame, 'oman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">You do ill to teach the child such words: he</div>
                              <div class="line">teaches him to hick and to hack, which they'll do</div>
                              <div class="line">fast enough of themselves, and to call 'horum:' fie upon you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Oman, art thou lunatics? hast thou no</div>
                              <div class="line">understandings for thy cases and the numbers of the</div>
                              <div class="line">genders? Thou art as foolish Christian creatures as</div>
                              <div class="line">I would desires.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, hold thy peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Show me now, William, some declensions of your pronouns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">WILLIAM PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Forsooth, I have forgot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is qui, quae, quod: if you forget your 'quies,'</div>
                              <div class="line">your 'quaes,' and your 'quods,' you must be</div>
                              <div class="line">preeches. Go your ways, and play; go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">He is a better scholar than I thought he was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">He is a good sprag memory. Farewell, Mistress Page.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu, good Sir Hugh.</div>
                              <p>Exit SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                              <div class="line">Get you home, boy. Come, we stay too long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in FORD'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF and MISTRESS FORD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Ford, your sorrow hath eaten up my</div>
                              <div class="line">sufferance. I see you are obsequious in your love,</div>
                              <div class="line">and I profess requital to a hair's breadth; not</div>
                              <div class="line">only, Mistress Ford, in the simple</div>
                              <div class="line">office of love, but in all the accoutrement,</div>
                              <div class="line">complement and ceremony of it. But are you</div>
                              <div class="line">sure of your husband now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a-birding, sweet Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What, ho, gossip Ford! what, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Step into the chamber, Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit FALSTAFF</p>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, sweetheart! who's at home besides yourself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, none but mine own people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">No, certainly.</div>
                              <p>Aside to her</p>
                              <div class="line">Speak louder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, I am so glad you have nobody here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, woman, your husband is in his old lunes again:</div>
                              <div class="line">he so takes on yonder with my husband; so rails</div>
                              <div class="line">against all married mankind; so curses all Eve's</div>
                              <div class="line">daughters, of what complexion soever; and so buffets</div>
                              <div class="line">himself on the forehead, crying, 'Peer out, peer</div>
                              <div class="line">out!' that any madness I ever yet beheld seemed but</div>
                              <div class="line">tameness, civility and patience, to this his</div>
                              <div class="line">distemper he is in now: I am glad the fat knight is not here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, does he talk of him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Of none but him; and swears he was carried out, the</div>
                              <div class="line">last time he searched for him, in a basket; protests</div>
                              <div class="line">to my husband he is now here, and hath drawn him and</div>
                              <div class="line">the rest of their company from their sport, to make</div>
                              <div class="line">another experiment of his suspicion: but I am glad</div>
                              <div class="line">the knight is not here; now he shall see his own foolery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">How near is he, Mistress Page?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hard by; at street end; he will be here anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I am undone! The knight is here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then you are utterly shamed, and he's but a dead</div>
                              <div class="line">man. What a woman are you!--Away with him, away</div>
                              <div class="line">with him! better shame than murder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Which way should be go? how should I bestow him?</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I put him into the basket again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I'll come no more i' the basket. May I not go</div>
                              <div class="line">out ere he come?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, three of Master Ford's brothers watch the door</div>
                              <div class="line">with pistols, that none shall issue out; otherwise</div>
                              <div class="line">you might slip away ere he came. But what make you here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall I do? I'll creep up into the chimney.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">There they always use to discharge their</div>
                              <div class="line">birding-pieces. Creep into the kiln-hole.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">He will seek there, on my word. Neither press,</div>
                              <div class="line">coffer, chest, trunk, well, vault, but he hath an</div>
                              <div class="line">abstract for the remembrance of such places, and</div>
                              <div class="line">goes to them by his note: there is no hiding you in the house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll go out then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">If you go out in your own semblance, you die, Sir</div>
                              <div class="line">John. Unless you go out disguised--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">How might we disguise him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas the day, I know not! There is no woman's gown</div>
                              <div class="line">big enough for him otherwise he might put on a hat,</div>
                              <div class="line">a muffler and a kerchief, and so escape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Good hearts, devise something: any extremity rather</div>
                              <div class="line">than a mischief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">My maid's aunt, the fat woman of Brentford, has a</div>
                              <div class="line">gown above.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">On my word, it will serve him; she's as big as he</div>
                              <div class="line">is: and there's her thrummed hat and her muffler</div>
                              <div class="line">too. Run up, Sir John.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, go, sweet Sir John: Mistress Page and I will</div>
                              <div class="line">look some linen for your head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Quick, quick! we'll come dress you straight: put</div>
                              <div class="line">on the gown the while.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I would my husband would meet him in this shape: he</div>
                              <div class="line">cannot abide the old woman of Brentford; he swears</div>
                              <div class="line">she's a witch; forbade her my house and hath</div>
                              <div class="line">threatened to beat her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven guide him to thy husband's cudgel, and the</div>
                              <div class="line">devil guide his cudgel afterwards!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">But is my husband coming?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, in good sadness, is he; and talks of the basket</div>
                              <div class="line">too, howsoever he hath had intelligence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll try that; for I'll appoint my men to carry the</div>
                              <div class="line">basket again, to meet him at the door with it, as</div>
                              <div class="line">they did last time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but he'll be here presently: let's go dress him</div>
                              <div class="line">like the witch of Brentford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll first direct my men what they shall do with the</div>
                              <div class="line">basket. Go up; I'll bring linen for him straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang him, dishonest varlet! we cannot misuse him enough.</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll leave a proof, by that which we will do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wives may be merry, and yet honest too:</div>
                              <div class="line">We do not act that often jest and laugh;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis old, but true, Still swine eat all the draff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Re-enter MISTRESS FORD with two Servants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, sirs, take the basket again on your shoulders:</div>
                              <div class="line">your master is hard at door; if he bid you set it</div>
                              <div class="line">down, obey him: quickly, dispatch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, take it up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heaven it be not full of knight again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope not; I had as lief bear so much lead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but if it prove true, Master Page, have you any</div>
                              <div class="line">way then to unfool me again? Set down the basket,</div>
                              <div class="line">villain! Somebody call my wife. Youth in a basket!</div>
                              <div class="line">O you panderly rascals! there's a knot, a ging, a</div>
                              <div class="line">pack, a conspiracy against me: now shall the devil</div>
                              <div class="line">be shamed. What, wife, I say! Come, come forth!</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold what honest clothes you send forth to bleaching!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this passes, Master Ford; you are not to go</div>
                              <div class="line">loose any longer; you must be pinioned.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is lunatics! this is mad as a mad dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, Master Ford, this is not well, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">So say I too, sir.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter MISTRESS FORD</p>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, Mistress Ford; Mistress Ford the honest</div>
                              <div class="line">woman, the modest wife, the virtuous creature, that</div>
                              <div class="line">hath the jealous fool to her husband! I suspect</div>
                              <div class="line">without cause, mistress, do I?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven be my witness you do, if you suspect me in</div>
                              <div class="line">any dishonesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, brazen-face! hold it out. Come forth, sirrah!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Pulling clothes out of the basket</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">This passes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you not ashamed? let the clothes alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall find you anon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis unreasonable! Will you take up your wife's</div>
                              <div class="line">clothes? Come away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Empty the basket, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, man, why?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Page, as I am a man, there was one conveyed</div>
                              <div class="line">out of my house yesterday in this basket: why may</div>
                              <div class="line">not he be there again? In my house I am sure he is:</div>
                              <div class="line">my intelligence is true; my jealousy is reasonable.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pluck me out all the linen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">If you find a man there, he shall die a flea's death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's no man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">By my fidelity, this is not well, Master Ford; this</div>
                              <div class="line">wrongs you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Ford, you must pray, and not follow the</div>
                              <div class="line">imaginations of your own heart: this is jealousies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, he's not here I seek for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">No, nor nowhere else but in your brain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Help to search my house this one time. If I find</div>
                              <div class="line">not what I seek, show no colour for my extremity; let</div>
                              <div class="line">me for ever be your table-sport; let them say of</div>
                              <div class="line">me, 'As jealous as Ford, Chat searched a hollow</div>
                              <div class="line">walnut for his wife's leman.' Satisfy me once more;</div>
                              <div class="line">once more search with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho, Mistress Page! come you and the old woman</div>
                              <div class="line">down; my husband will come into the chamber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Old woman! what old woman's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is my maid's aunt of Brentford.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">A witch, a quean, an old cozening quean! Have I not</div>
                              <div class="line">forbid her my house? She comes of errands, does</div>
                              <div class="line">she? We are simple men; we do not know what's</div>
                              <div class="line">brought to pass under the profession of</div>
                              <div class="line">fortune-telling. She works by charms, by spells,</div>
                              <div class="line">by the figure, and such daubery as this is, beyond</div>
                              <div class="line">our element we know nothing. Come down, you witch,</div>
                              <div class="line">you hag, you; come down, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good, sweet husband! Good gentlemen, let him</div>
                              <div class="line">not strike the old woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter FALSTAFF in woman's clothes, and
MISTRESS PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Mother Prat; come, give me your hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll prat her.</div>
                              <p>Beating him</p>
                              <div class="line">Out of my door, you witch, you hag, you baggage, you</div>
                              <div class="line">polecat, you runyon! out, out! I'll conjure you,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fortune-tell you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you not ashamed? I think you have killed the</div>
                              <div class="line">poor woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, he will do it. 'Tis a goodly credit for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang her, witch!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">By the yea and no, I think the 'oman is a witch</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed: I like not when a 'oman has a great peard;</div>
                              <div class="line">I spy a great peard under his muffler.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you follow, gentlemen? I beseech you, follow;</div>
                              <div class="line">see but the issue of my jealousy: if I cry out thus</div>
                              <div class="line">upon no trail, never trust me when I open again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's obey his humour a little further: come,</div>
                              <div class="line">gentlemen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FORD, PAGE, SHALLOW, DOCTOR CAIUS, and
SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust me, he beat him most pitifully.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, by the mass, that he did not; he beat him most</div>
                              <div class="line">unpitifully, methought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have the cudgel hallowed and hung o'er the</div>
                              <div class="line">altar; it hath done meritorious service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What think you? may we, with the warrant of</div>
                              <div class="line">womanhood and the witness of a good conscience,</div>
                              <div class="line">pursue him with any further revenge?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">The spirit of wantonness is, sure, scared out of</div>
                              <div class="line">him: if the devil have him not in fee-simple, with</div>
                              <div class="line">fine and recovery, he will never, I think, in the</div>
                              <div class="line">way of waste, attempt us again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we tell our husbands how we have served him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, by all means; if it be but to scrape the</div>
                              <div class="line">figures out of your husband's brains. If they can</div>
                              <div class="line">find in their hearts the poor unvirtuous fat knight</div>
                              <div class="line">shall be any further afflicted, we two will still be</div>
                              <div class="line">the ministers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll warrant they'll have him publicly shamed: and</div>
                              <div class="line">methinks there would be no period to the jest,</div>
                              <div class="line">should he not be publicly shamed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, to the forge with it then; shape it: I would</div>
                              <div class="line">not have things cool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Host and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, the Germans desire to have three of your</div>
                              <div class="line">horses: the duke himself will be to-morrow at</div>
                              <div class="line">court, and they are going to meet him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What duke should that be comes so secretly? I hear</div>
                              <div class="line">not of him in the court. Let me speak with the</div>
                              <div class="line">gentlemen: they speak English?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; I'll call them to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">They shall have my horses; but I'll make them pay;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll sauce them: they have had my house a week at</div>
                              <div class="line">command; I have turned away my other guests: they</div>
                              <div class="line">must come off; I'll sauce them. Come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in FORD'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD,
and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis one of the best discretions of a 'oman as ever</div>
                              <div class="line">I did look upon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">And did he send you both these letters at an instant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Within a quarter of an hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, wife. Henceforth do what thou wilt;</div>
                              <div class="line">I rather will suspect the sun with cold</div>
                              <div class="line">Than thee with wantonness: now doth thy honour stand</div>
                              <div class="line">In him that was of late an heretic,</div>
                              <div class="line">As firm as faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well, 'tis well; no more:</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not as extreme in submission</div>
                              <div class="line">As in offence.</div>
                              <div class="line">But let our plot go forward: let our wives</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet once again, to make us public sport,</div>
                              <div class="line">Appoint a meeting with this old fat fellow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where we may take him and disgrace him for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no better way than that they spoke of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">How? to send him word they'll meet him in the park</div>
                              <div class="line">at midnight? Fie, fie! he'll never come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">You say he has been thrown in the rivers and has</div>
                              <div class="line">been grievously peaten as an old 'oman: methinks</div>
                              <div class="line">there should be terrors in him that he should not</div>
                              <div class="line">come; methinks his flesh is punished, he shall have</div>
                              <div class="line">no desires.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">So think I too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Devise but how you'll use him when he comes,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let us two devise to bring him thither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">There is an old tale goes that Herne the hunter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometime a keeper here in Windsor forest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth all the winter-time, at still midnight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Walk round about an oak, with great ragg'd horns;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there he blasts the tree and takes the cattle</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes milch-kine yield blood and shakes a chain</div>
                              <div class="line">In a most hideous and dreadful manner:</div>
                              <div class="line">You have heard of such a spirit, and well you know</div>
                              <div class="line">The superstitious idle-headed eld</div>
                              <div class="line">Received and did deliver to our age</div>
                              <div class="line">This tale of Herne the hunter for a truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, yet there want not many that do fear</div>
                              <div class="line">In deep of night to walk by this Herne's oak:</div>
                              <div class="line">But what of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, this is our device;</div>
                              <div class="line">That Falstaff at that oak shall meet with us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, let it not be doubted but he'll come:</div>
                              <div class="line">And in this shape when you have brought him thither,</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall be done with him? what is your plot?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">That likewise have we thought upon, and thus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nan Page my daughter and my little son</div>
                              <div class="line">And three or four more of their growth we'll dress</div>
                              <div class="line">Like urchins, ouphes and fairies, green and white,</div>
                              <div class="line">With rounds of waxen tapers on their heads,</div>
                              <div class="line">And rattles in their hands: upon a sudden,</div>
                              <div class="line">As Falstaff, she and I, are newly met,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let them from forth a sawpit rush at once</div>
                              <div class="line">With some diffused song: upon their sight,</div>
                              <div class="line">We two in great amazedness will fly:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let them all encircle him about</div>
                              <div class="line">And, fairy-like, to-pinch the unclean knight,</div>
                              <div class="line">And ask him why, that hour of fairy revel,</div>
                              <div class="line">In their so sacred paths he dares to tread</div>
                              <div class="line">In shape profane.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And till he tell the truth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the supposed fairies pinch him sound</div>
                              <div class="line">And burn him with their tapers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">The truth being known,</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll all present ourselves, dis-horn the spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And mock him home to Windsor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">The children must</div>
                              <div class="line">Be practised well to this, or they'll ne'er do't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will teach the children their behaviors; and I</div>
                              <div class="line">will be like a jack-an-apes also, to burn the</div>
                              <div class="line">knight with my taber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">That will be excellent. I'll go and buy them vizards.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">My Nan shall be the queen of all the fairies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Finely attired in a robe of white.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">That silk will I go buy.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">And in that time</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall Master Slender steal my Nan away</div>
                              <div class="line">And marry her at Eton. Go send to Falstaff straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay I'll to him again in name of Brook</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll tell me all his purpose: sure, he'll come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear not you that. Go get us properties</div>
                              <div class="line">And tricking for our fairies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us about it: it is admirable pleasures and fery</div>
                              <div class="line">honest knaveries.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PAGE, FORD, and SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, Mistress Ford,</div>
                              <div class="line">Send quickly to Sir John, to know his mind.</div>
                              <p>Exit MISTRESS FORD</p>
                              <div class="line">I'll to the doctor: he hath my good will,</div>
                              <div class="line">And none but he, to marry with Nan Page.</div>
                              <div class="line">That Slender, though well landed, is an idiot;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he my husband best of all affects.</div>
                              <div class="line">The doctor is well money'd, and his friends</div>
                              <div class="line">Potent at court: he, none but he, shall have her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though twenty thousand worthier come to crave her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Host and SIMPLE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What wouldst thou have, boor? what: thick-skin?</div>
                              <div class="line">speak, breathe, discuss; brief, short, quick, snap.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I come to speak with Sir John Falstaff</div>
                              <div class="line">from Master Slender.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">There's his chamber, his house, his castle, his</div>
                              <div class="line">standing-bed and truckle-bed; 'tis painted about</div>
                              <div class="line">with the story of the Prodigal, fresh and new. Go</div>
