                              <div class="line">knock and call; hell speak like an Anthropophaginian</div>
                              <div class="line">unto thee: knock, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">There's an old woman, a fat woman, gone up into his</div>
                              <div class="line">chamber: I'll be so bold as stay, sir, till she come</div>
                              <div class="line">down; I come to speak with her, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! a fat woman! the knight may be robbed: I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">call. Bully knight! bully Sir John! speak from</div>
                              <div class="line">thy lungs military: art thou there? it is thine</div>
                              <div class="line">host, thine Ephesian, calls.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Above</span>  How now, mine host!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's a Bohemian-Tartar tarries the coming down of</div>
                              <div class="line">thy fat woman. Let her descend, bully, let her</div>
                              <div class="line">descend; my chambers are honourable: fie! privacy?</div>
                              <div class="line">fie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">There was, mine host, an old fat woman even now with</div>
                              <div class="line">me; but she's gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, sir, was't not the wise woman of</div>
                              <div class="line">Brentford?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, was it, mussel-shell: what would you with her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">My master, sir, Master Slender, sent to her, seeing</div>
                              <div class="line">her go through the streets, to know, sir, whether</div>
                              <div class="line">one Nym, sir, that beguiled him of a chain, had the</div>
                              <div class="line">chain or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I spake with the old woman about it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">And what says she, I pray, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, she says that the very same man that</div>
                              <div class="line">beguiled Master Slender of his chain cozened him of</div>
                              <div class="line">it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I could have spoken with the woman herself;</div>
                              <div class="line">I had other things to have spoken with her too from</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What are they? let us know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, come; quick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I may not conceal them, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Conceal them, or thou diest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, they were nothing but about Mistress Anne</div>
                              <div class="line">Page; to know if it were my master's fortune to</div>
                              <div class="line">have her or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis, 'tis his fortune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">To have her, or no. Go; say the woman told me so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">May I be bold to say so, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; like who more bold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIMPLE</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank your worship: I shall make my master glad</div>
                              <div class="line">with these tidings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art clerkly, thou art clerkly, Sir John. Was</div>
                              <div class="line">there a wise woman with thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that there was, mine host; one that hath taught</div>
                              <div class="line">me more wit than ever I learned before in my life;</div>
                              <div class="line">and I paid nothing for it neither, but was paid for</div>
                              <div class="line">my learning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, alas, sir! cozenage, mere cozenage!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Where be my horses? speak well of them, varletto.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BARDOLPH</div>
                              <div class="line">Run away with the cozeners; for so soon as I came</div>
                              <div class="line">beyond Eton, they threw me off from behind one of</div>
                              <div class="line">them, in a slough of mire; and set spurs and away,</div>
                              <div class="line">like three German devils, three Doctor Faustuses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">They are gone but to meet the duke, villain: do not</div>
                              <div class="line">say they be fled; Germans are honest men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is mine host?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have a care of your entertainments: there is a</div>
                              <div class="line">friend of mine come to town tells me there is three</div>
                              <div class="line">cozen-germans that has cozened all the hosts of</div>
                              <div class="line">Readins, of Maidenhead, of Colebrook, of horses and</div>
                              <div class="line">money. I tell you for good will, look you: you</div>
                              <div class="line">are wise and full of gibes and vlouting-stocks, and</div>
                              <div class="line">'tis not convenient you should be cozened. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vere is mine host de Jarteer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, master doctor, in perplexity and doubtful dilemma.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot tell vat is dat: but it is tell-a me dat</div>
                              <div class="line">you make grand preparation for a duke de Jamany: by</div>
                              <div class="line">my trot, dere is no duke dat the court is know to</div>
                              <div class="line">come. I tell you for good vill: adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Hue and cry, villain, go! Assist me, knight. I am</div>
                              <div class="line">undone! Fly, run, hue and cry, villain! I am undone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Host and BARDOLPH</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I would all the world might be cozened; for I have</div>
                              <div class="line">been cozened and beaten too. If it should come to</div>
                              <div class="line">the ear of the court, how I have been transformed</div>
                              <div class="line">and how my transformation hath been washed and</div>
                              <div class="line">cudgelled, they would melt me out of my fat drop by</div>
                              <div class="line">drop and liquor fishermen's boots with me; I warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">they would whip me with their fine wits till I were</div>
                              <div class="line">as crest-fallen as a dried pear. I never prospered</div>
                              <div class="line">since I forswore myself at primero. Well, if my</div>
                              <div class="line">wind were but long enough to say my prayers, I would repent.</div>
                              <p>Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, whence come you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">From the two parties, forsooth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">The devil take one party and his dam the other! and</div>
                              <div class="line">so they shall be both bestowed. I have suffered more</div>
                              <div class="line">for their sakes, more than the villanous inconstancy</div>
                              <div class="line">of man's disposition is able to bear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">And have not they suffered? Yes, I warrant;</div>
                              <div class="line">speciously one of them; Mistress Ford, good heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">is beaten black and blue, that you cannot see a</div>
                              <div class="line">white spot about her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What tellest thou me of black and blue? I was</div>
                              <div class="line">beaten myself into all the colours of the rainbow;</div>
                              <div class="line">and I was like to be apprehended for the witch of</div>
                              <div class="line">Brentford: but that my admirable dexterity of wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">my counterfeiting the action of an old woman,</div>
                              <div class="line">delivered me, the knave constable had set me i' the</div>
                              <div class="line">stocks, i' the common stocks, for a witch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, let me speak with you in your chamber: you</div>
                              <div class="line">shall hear how things go; and, I warrant, to your</div>
                              <div class="line">content. Here is a letter will say somewhat. Good</div>
                              <div class="line">hearts, what ado here is to bring you together!</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, one of you does not serve heaven well, that</div>
                              <div class="line">you are so crossed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Come up into my chamber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE VI.  Another room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FENTON and Host</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Fenton, talk not to me; my mind is heavy: I</div>
                              <div class="line">will give over all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet hear me speak. Assist me in my purpose,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, as I am a gentleman, I'll give thee</div>
                              <div class="line">A hundred pound in gold more than your loss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">I will hear you, Master Fenton; and I will at the</div>
                              <div class="line">least keep your counsel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">From time to time I have acquainted you</div>
                              <div class="line">With the dear love I bear to fair Anne Page;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who mutually hath answer'd my affection,</div>
                              <div class="line">So far forth as herself might be her chooser,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to my wish: I have a letter from her</div>
                              <div class="line">Of such contents as you will wonder at;</div>
                              <div class="line">The mirth whereof so larded with my matter,</div>
                              <div class="line">That neither singly can be manifested,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without the show of both; fat Falstaff</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath a great scene: the image of the jest</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show you here at large. Hark, good mine host.</div>
                              <div class="line">To-night at Herne's oak, just 'twixt twelve and one,</div>
                              <div class="line">Must my sweet Nan present the Fairy Queen;</div>
                              <div class="line">The purpose why, is here: in which disguise,</div>
                              <div class="line">While other jests are something rank on foot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her father hath commanded her to slip</div>
                              <div class="line">Away with Slender and with him at Eton</div>
                              <div class="line">Immediately to marry: she hath consented: Now, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her mother, ever strong against that match</div>
                              <div class="line">And firm for Doctor Caius, hath appointed</div>
                              <div class="line">That he shall likewise shuffle her away,</div>
                              <div class="line">While other sports are tasking of their minds,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the deanery, where a priest attends,</div>
                              <div class="line">Straight marry her: to this her mother's plot</div>
                              <div class="line">She seemingly obedient likewise hath</div>
                              <div class="line">Made promise to the doctor. Now, thus it rests:</div>
                              <div class="line">Her father means she shall be all in white,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in that habit, when Slender sees his time</div>
                              <div class="line">To take her by the hand and bid her go,</div>
                              <div class="line">She shall go with him: her mother hath intended,</div>
                              <div class="line">The better to denote her to the doctor,</div>
                              <div class="line">For they must all be mask'd and vizarded,</div>
                              <div class="line">That quaint in green she shall be loose enrobed,</div>
                              <div class="line">With ribands pendent, flaring 'bout her head;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when the doctor spies his vantage ripe,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pinch her by the hand, and, on that token,</div>
                              <div class="line">The maid hath given consent to go with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Which means she to deceive, father or mother?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">Both, my good host, to go along with me:</div>
                              <div class="line">And here it rests, that you'll procure the vicar</div>
                              <div class="line">To stay for me at church 'twixt twelve and one,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in the lawful name of marrying,</div>
                              <div class="line">To give our hearts united ceremony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Host</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, husband your device; I'll to the vicar:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring you the maid, you shall not lack a priest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FENTON</div>
                              <div class="line">So shall I evermore be bound to thee;</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, I'll make a present recompense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  A room in the Garter Inn.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  Windsor Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  A street leading to the Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. SCENE IV.  Windsor Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.6">5. SCENE V.  Another part of the Park.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A room in the Garter Inn.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF and MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, no more prattling; go. I'll hold. This is</div>
                              <div class="line">the third time; I hope good luck lies in odd</div>
                              <div class="line">numbers. Away I go. They say there is divinity in</div>
                              <div class="line">odd numbers, either in nativity, chance, or death. Away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll provide you a chain; and I'll do what I can to</div>
                              <div class="line">get you a pair of horns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, I say; time wears: hold up your head, and mince.</div>
                              <p>Exit MISTRESS QUICKLY</p>
                              <p>Enter FORD</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Master Brook! Master Brook, the matter</div>
                              <div class="line">will be known to-night, or never. Be you in the</div>
                              <div class="line">Park about midnight, at Herne's oak, and you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">see wonders.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Went you not to her yesterday, sir, as you told me</div>
                              <div class="line">you had appointed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I went to her, Master Brook, as you see, like a poor</div>
                              <div class="line">old man: but I came from her, Master Brook, like a</div>
                              <div class="line">poor old woman. That same knave Ford, her husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">hath the finest mad devil of jealousy in him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Brook, that ever governed frenzy. I will tell</div>
                              <div class="line">you: he beat me grievously, in the shape of a</div>
                              <div class="line">woman; for in the shape of man, Master Brook, I fear</div>
                              <div class="line">not Goliath with a weaver's beam; because I know</div>
                              <div class="line">also life is a shuttle. I am in haste; go along</div>
                              <div class="line">with me: I'll tell you all, Master Brook. Since I</div>
                              <div class="line">plucked geese, played truant and whipped top, I knew</div>
                              <div class="line">not what 'twas to be beaten till lately. Follow</div>
                              <div class="line">me: I'll tell you strange things of this knave</div>
                              <div class="line">Ford, on whom to-night I will be revenged, and I</div>
                              <div class="line">will deliver his wife into your hand. Follow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Strange things in hand, Master Brook! Follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Windsor Park.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PAGE, SHALLOW, and SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come; we'll couch i' the castle-ditch till we</div>
                              <div class="line">see the light of our fairies. Remember, son Slender,</div>
                              <div class="line">my daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, forsooth; I have spoke with her and we have a</div>
                              <div class="line">nay-word how to know one another: I come to her in</div>
                              <div class="line">white, and cry 'mum;' she cries 'budget;' and by</div>
                              <div class="line">that we know one another.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SHALLOW</div>
                              <div class="line">That's good too: but what needs either your 'mum'</div>
                              <div class="line">or her 'budget?' the white will decipher her well</div>
                              <div class="line">enough. It hath struck ten o'clock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">The night is dark; light and spirits will become it</div>
                              <div class="line">well. Heaven prosper our sport! No man means evil</div>
                              <div class="line">but the devil, and we shall know him by his horns.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's away; follow me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A street leading to the Park.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and
DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Master doctor, my daughter is in green: when you</div>
                              <div class="line">see your time, take her by the band, away with her</div>
                              <div class="line">to the deanery, and dispatch it quickly. Go before</div>
                              <div class="line">into the Park: we two must go together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I know vat I have to do. Adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well, sir.</div>
                              <p>Exit DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">My husband will not rejoice so much at the abuse of</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff as he will chafe at the doctor's marrying</div>
                              <div class="line">my daughter: but 'tis no matter; better a little</div>
                              <div class="line">chiding than a great deal of heart-break.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is Nan now and her troop of fairies, and the</div>
                              <div class="line">Welsh devil Hugh?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">They are all couched in a pit hard by Herne's oak,</div>
                              <div class="line">with obscured lights; which, at the very instant of</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff's and our meeting, they will at once</div>
                              <div class="line">display to the night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">That cannot choose but amaze him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be not amazed, he will be mocked; if he be</div>
                              <div class="line">amazed, he will every way be mocked.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll betray him finely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Against such lewdsters and their lechery</div>
                              <div class="line">Those that betray them do no treachery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">The hour draws on. To the oak, to the oak!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Windsor Park.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised, with others as Fairies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Trib, trib, fairies; come; and remember your parts:</div>
                              <div class="line">be pold, I pray you; follow me into the pit; and</div>
                              <div class="line">when I give the watch-'ords, do as I pid you:</div>
                              <div class="line">come, come; trib, trib.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another part of the Park.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FALSTAFF disguised as Herne</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">The Windsor bell hath struck twelve; the minute</div>
                              <div class="line">draws on. Now, the hot-blooded gods assist me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Remember, Jove, thou wast a bull for thy Europa; love</div>
                              <div class="line">set on thy horns. O powerful love! that, in some</div>
                              <div class="line">respects, makes a beast a man, in some other, a man</div>
                              <div class="line">a beast. You were also, Jupiter, a swan for the love</div>
                              <div class="line">of Leda. O omnipotent Love! how near the god drew</div>
                              <div class="line">to the complexion of a goose! A fault done first in</div>
                              <div class="line">the form of a beast. O Jove, a beastly fault! And</div>
                              <div class="line">then another fault in the semblance of a fowl; think</div>
                              <div class="line">on 't, Jove; a foul fault! When gods have hot</div>
                              <div class="line">backs, what shall poor men do? For me, I am here a</div>
                              <div class="line">Windsor stag; and the fattest, I think, i' the</div>
                              <div class="line">forest. Send me a cool rut-time, Jove, or who can</div>
                              <div class="line">blame me to piss my tallow? Who comes here? my</div>
                              <div class="line">doe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS FORD and MISTRESS PAGE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John! art thou there, my deer? my male deer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">My doe with the black scut! Let the sky rain</div>
                              <div class="line">potatoes; let it thunder to the tune of Green</div>
                              <div class="line">Sleeves, hail kissing-comfits and snow eringoes; let</div>
                              <div class="line">there come a tempest of provocation, I will shelter me here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Page is come with me, sweetheart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Divide me like a bribe buck, each a haunch: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">keep my sides to myself, my shoulders for the fellow</div>
                              <div class="line">of this walk, and my horns I bequeath your husbands.</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I a woodman, ha? Speak I like Herne the hunter?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, now is Cupid a child of conscience; he makes</div>
                              <div class="line">restitution. As I am a true spirit, welcome!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Noise within</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, what noise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven forgive our sins</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">What should this be?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They run off</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I think the devil will not have me damned, lest the</div>
                              <div class="line">oil that's in me should set hell on fire; he would</div>
                              <div class="line">never else cross me thus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SIR HUGH EVANS, disguised as before; PISTOL,
as Hobgoblin; MISTRESS QUICKLY, ANNE PAGE, and
others, as Fairies, with tapers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Fairies, black, grey, green, and white,</div>
                              <div class="line">You moonshine revellers and shades of night,</div>
                              <div class="line">You orphan heirs of fixed destiny,</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend your office and your quality.</div>
                              <div class="line">Crier Hobgoblin, make the fairy oyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Elves, list your names; silence, you airy toys.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cricket, to Windsor chimneys shalt thou leap:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where fires thou find'st unraked and hearths unswept,</div>
                              <div class="line">There pinch the maids as blue as bilberry:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our radiant queen hates sluts and sluttery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">They are fairies; he that speaks to them shall die:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll wink and couch: no man their works must eye.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Lies down upon his face</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where's Bede? Go you, and where you find a maid</div>
                              <div class="line">That, ere she sleep, has thrice her prayers said,</div>
                              <div class="line">Raise up the organs of her fantasy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sleep she as sound as careless infancy:</div>
                              <div class="line">But those as sleep and think not on their sins,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pinch them, arms, legs, backs, shoulders, sides and shins.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">About, about;</div>
                              <div class="line">Search Windsor Castle, elves, within and out:</div>
                              <div class="line">Strew good luck, ouphes, on every sacred room:</div>
                              <div class="line">That it may stand till the perpetual doom,</div>
                              <div class="line">In state as wholesome as in state 'tis fit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy the owner, and the owner it.</div>
                              <div class="line">The several chairs of order look you scour</div>
                              <div class="line">With juice of balm and every precious flower:</div>
                              <div class="line">Each fair instalment, coat, and several crest,</div>
                              <div class="line">With loyal blazon, evermore be blest!</div>
                              <div class="line">And nightly, meadow-fairies, look you sing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like to the Garter's compass, in a ring:</div>
                              <div class="line">The expressure that it bears, green let it be,</div>
                              <div class="line">More fertile-fresh than all the field to see;</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'Honi soit qui mal y pense' write</div>
                              <div class="line">In emerald tufts, flowers purple, blue and white;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let sapphire, pearl and rich embroidery,</div>
                              <div class="line">Buckled below fair knighthood's bending knee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fairies use flowers for their charactery.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away; disperse: but till 'tis one o'clock,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our dance of custom round about the oak</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Herne the hunter, let us not forget.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, lock hand in hand; yourselves in order set</div>
                              <div class="line">And twenty glow-worms shall our lanterns be,</div>
                              <div class="line">To guide our measure round about the tree.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, stay; I smell a man of middle-earth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Heavens defend me from that Welsh fairy, lest he</div>
                              <div class="line">transform me to a piece of cheese!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">Vile worm, thou wast o'erlook'd even in thy birth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">With trial-fire touch me his finger-end:</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be chaste, the flame will back descend</div>
                              <div class="line">And turn him to no pain; but if he start,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the flesh of a corrupted heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PISTOL</div>
                              <div class="line">A trial, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, will this wood take fire?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They burn him with their tapers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Oh, Oh, Oh!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS QUICKLY</div>
                              <div class="line">Corrupt, corrupt, and tainted in desire!</div>
                              <div class="line">About him, fairies; sing a scornful rhyme;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, as you trip, still pinch him to your time.</div>
                              <h3 class="bridgehead">SONG.</h3>
                              <div class="line">Fie on sinful fantasy!</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie on lust and luxury!</div>
                              <div class="line">Lust is but a bloody fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Kindled with unchaste desire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fed in heart, whose flames aspire</div>
                              <div class="line">As thoughts do blow them, higher and higher.</div>
                              <div class="line">Pinch him, fairies, mutually;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pinch him for his villany;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pinch him, and burn him, and turn him about,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till candles and starlight and moonshine be out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>During this song they pinch FALSTAFF. DOCTOR CAIUS
comes one way, and steals away a boy in green;
SLENDER another way, and takes off a boy in white;
and FENTON comes and steals away ANN PAGE.
A noise of hunting is heard within. All the
Fairies run away. FALSTAFF pulls off his buck's
head, and rises</p>
                        <p>Enter PAGE, FORD, MISTRESS PAGE, and MISTRESS FORD</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, do not fly; I think we have watch'd you now</div>
                              <div class="line">Will none but Herne the hunter serve your turn?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, come, hold up the jest no higher</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good Sir John, how like you Windsor wives?</div>
                              <div class="line">See you these, husband? do not these fair yokes</div>
                              <div class="line">Become the forest better than the town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, sir, who's a cuckold now? Master Brook,</div>
                              <div class="line">Falstaff's a knave, a cuckoldly knave; here are his</div>
                              <div class="line">horns, Master Brook: and, Master Brook, he hath</div>
                              <div class="line">enjoyed nothing of Ford's but his buck-basket, his</div>
                              <div class="line">cudgel, and twenty pounds of money, which must be</div>
                              <div class="line">paid to Master Brook; his horses are arrested for</div>
                              <div class="line">it, Master Brook.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John, we have had ill luck; we could never meet.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will never take you for my love again; but I will</div>
                              <div class="line">always count you my deer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">I do begin to perceive that I am made an ass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and an ox too: both the proofs are extant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">And these are not fairies? I was three or four</div>
                              <div class="line">times in the thought they were not fairies: and yet</div>
                              <div class="line">the guiltiness of my mind, the sudden surprise of my</div>
                              <div class="line">powers, drove the grossness of the foppery into a</div>
                              <div class="line">received belief, in despite of the teeth of all</div>
                              <div class="line">rhyme and reason, that they were fairies. See now</div>
                              <div class="line">how wit may be made a Jack-a-Lent, when 'tis upon</div>
                              <div class="line">ill employment!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir John Falstaff, serve Got, and leave your</div>
                              <div class="line">desires, and fairies will not pinse you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, fairy Hugh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave your jealousies too, I pray you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">I will never mistrust my wife again till thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">able to woo her in good English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I laid my brain in the sun and dried it, that</div>
                              <div class="line">it wants matter to prevent so gross o'erreaching as</div>
                              <div class="line">this? Am I ridden with a Welsh goat too? shall I</div>
                              <div class="line">have a coxcomb of frize? 'Tis time I were choked</div>
                              <div class="line">with a piece of toasted cheese.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">Seese is not good to give putter; your belly is all putter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">'Seese' and 'putter'! have I lived to stand at the</div>
                              <div class="line">taunt of one that makes fritters of English? This</div>
                              <div class="line">is enough to be the decay of lust and late-walking</div>
                              <div class="line">through the realm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why Sir John, do you think, though we would have the</div>
                              <div class="line">virtue out of our hearts by the head and shoulders</div>
                              <div class="line">and have given ourselves without scruple to hell,</div>
                              <div class="line">that ever the devil could have made you our delight?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">What, a hodge-pudding? a bag of flax?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">A puffed man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Old, cold, withered and of intolerable entrails?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And one that is as slanderous as Satan?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">And as poor as Job?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">And as wicked as his wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SIR HUGH EVANS</div>
                              <div class="line">And given to fornications, and to taverns and sack</div>
                              <div class="line">and wine and metheglins, and to drinkings and</div>
                              <div class="line">swearings and starings, pribbles and prabbles?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FALSTAFF</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I am your theme: you have the start of me; I</div>
                              <div class="line">am dejected; I am not able to answer the Welsh</div>
                              <div class="line">flannel; ignorance itself is a plummet o'er me: use</div>
                              <div class="line">me as you will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, we'll bring you to Windsor, to one</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Brook, that you have cozened of money, to</div>
                              <div class="line">whom you should have been a pander: over and above</div>
                              <div class="line">that you have suffered, I think to repay that money</div>
                              <div class="line">will be a biting affliction.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet be cheerful, knight: thou shalt eat a posset</div>
                              <div class="line">to-night at my house; where I will desire thee to</div>
                              <div class="line">laugh at my wife, that now laughs at thee: tell her</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Slender hath married her daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Doctors doubt that: if Anne Page be my</div>
                              <div class="line">daughter, she is, by this, Doctor Caius' wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter SLENDER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoa ho! ho, father Page!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Son, how now! how now, son! have you dispatched?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispatched! I'll make the best in Gloucestershire</div>
                              <div class="line">know on't; would I were hanged, la, else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what, son?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I came yonder at Eton to marry Mistress Anne Page,</div>
                              <div class="line">and she's a great lubberly boy. If it had not been</div>
                              <div class="line">i' the church, I would have swinged him, or he</div>
                              <div class="line">should have swinged me. If I did not think it had</div>
                              <div class="line">been Anne Page, would I might never stir!--and 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">a postmaster's boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my life, then, you took the wrong.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">What need you tell me that? I think so, when I took</div>
                              <div class="line">a boy for a girl. If I had been married to him, for</div>
                              <div class="line">all he was in woman's apparel, I would not have had</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is your own folly. Did not I tell you how</div>
                              <div class="line">you should know my daughter by her garments?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SLENDER</div>
                              <div class="line">I went to her in white, and cried 'mum,' and she</div>
                              <div class="line">cried 'budget,' as Anne and I had appointed; and yet</div>
                              <div class="line">it was not Anne, but a postmaster's boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good George, be not angry: I knew of your purpose;</div>
                              <div class="line">turned my daughter into green; and, indeed, she is</div>
                              <div class="line">now with the doctor at the deanery, and there married.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DOCTOR CAIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Vere is Mistress Page? By gar, I am cozened: I ha'</div>
                              <div class="line">married un garcon, a boy; un paysan, by gar, a boy;</div>
                              <div class="line">it is not Anne Page: by gar, I am cozened.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, did you take her in green?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DOCTOR CAIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, by gar, and 'tis a boy: by gar, I'll raise all Windsor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FORD</div>
                              <div class="line">This is strange. Who hath got the right Anne?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart misgives me: here comes Master Fenton.</div>
                              <p>Enter FENTON and ANNE PAGE</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Master Fenton!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANNE PAGE</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, good father! good my mother, pardon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAGE</div>
